name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1761
text_en: Not now [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1762
text_en: well, i guess first, do u know what a piano is? maybe?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_1
text_en: OK I’m bored. Maybe a little curious too ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_2
text_en: Curious about what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_3
text_en: Only boring people get bored.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_5
text_en: do u prefer coffee or tea?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_6
text_en: if only we could all be as amusing as u :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_7
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SUNGLASSES>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_8
text_en: Coffee. You?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_9
text_en: Tea. You?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_10
text_en: I've never had either, honestly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_11
text_en: both are good! depends on the day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_12
text_en: okay wow so we have to fix that!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_13
text_en: That would be the day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_14
text_en: I'm just kidding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_15
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_16
text_en: Sorry. Bad joke. How may I cure your boredom, m'lady?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_17
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPYHAND>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_18
text_en: tell me about ur day!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_19
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_AOICAT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_20
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SLEEPING>Zzzz

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_21
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_MUSIC1>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_22
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_DOG>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_23
text_en: oh my bad. sweet dreams!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_24
text_en: whatcha listening to?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_25
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_YUM>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_26
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_AWHUG>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_27
text_en: On-lyne, of course.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_28
text_en: Nightwave. It's like a radio show in space.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_29
text_en: would u like milk or sugar in ur caffeinated bevvy?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_30
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HORRIFIED>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_31
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SMITTEN>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_32
text_en: aaw u charmer. do u really like them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_33
text_en: Or... radio with a side of vigilante justice.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_34
text_en: Or... radio that gives its listeners trinkets... and guns.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_35
text_en: Both

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_36
text_en: I'd prefer black

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_37
text_en: Sugar

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_38
text_en: Milk

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_39
text_en: best of both worlds, hmm? I respect that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_40
text_en: oo la la. black as ur soul, no? ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_41
text_en: how sweet of you! ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_42
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_COW>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_43
text_en: ur response has been carefully noted

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_44
text_en: have a nice day!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_45
text_en: Just another typical day of inter-dimensional cosmic warfare. Can't complain.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_46
text_en: So far, so good. How's your day going?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_47
text_en: delightful!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_48
text_en: I'm watching Quincy pretend he's not annoyed that he missed the bullseye during target practice

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_49
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_FOOD>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_50
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_STARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_51
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PASSGLASSES>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_52
text_en: k thx not bored anymore

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_53
text_en: oh that's cool! ^_^ sry

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_54
text_en: Sure I do. Why not?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_55
text_en: haha what made you think I was lying?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_56
text_en: You like their music too, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_57
text_en: How far off the mark was he?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_58
text_en: Hey, I get it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_59
text_en: like an inch off the center lol. end of the world, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_60
text_en: the annoyed part or the pretending not to be annoyed part?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_61
text_en: All of the above.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_62
text_en: The pretending.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_63
text_en: The watching part.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_64
text_en: The annoyed part.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_65
text_en: ur telling me I have TWO roguish perfectionists to worry about now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_66
text_en: what a wonderfully mysterious thing to say

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_67
text_en: oh... :) yeaaaaah

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_68
text_en: pretty hard on yourself, are u? that's too bad. u deserve better :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_69
text_en: oof he's been frowning silently into the void for like 5 mins. I should at least try to cheer him up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_70
text_en: we'll chat more later, yah? ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_71
text_en: wellll I've heard a lot of "pop isn't real music" and "hating things u like makes me unique"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_72
text_en: but enough about me! what's music like in the future?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_73
text_en: im totally telling Arthur u said that ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_74
text_en: Hey, anyone who says that about things you enjoy totally sucks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_75
text_en: You ever heard of a Shawzin?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_76
text_en: nope! tell me about it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_77
text_en: It's like a string instrument.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_78
text_en: It's a "future" instrument. Sounds like... I actually have no way to describe it. A storybook?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_79
text_en: (kidding)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_80
text_en: (unless you dont care bc i will so tell Arthur u said that)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_81
text_en: Haha. Go for it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_82
text_en: Yikes. I'd better not walk into that. Lol.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_83
text_en: deal

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_84
text_en: then it's our little secret!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_85
text_en: but fr thx for saying that ^_^ and curing my boredom

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_86
text_en: like a guitar? piano? octobass?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_87
text_en: Octopus?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_88
text_en: Guitar.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_89
text_en: Piano.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_90
text_en: sounds beautiful ^_^ I'd like to hear it some time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_91
text_en: sure

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_92
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SHRUG>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_93
text_en: I'll just have to bring you to the future with me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_94
text_en: I'll just have to bring one to the past with me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_95
text_en: I'll hold you to that ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_96
text_en: Ah. Well, no. Not like an octopus. More like a guitar.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_97
text_en: No bass like octopus bass, I guess. Lol.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_98
text_en: aaw I was ready to hear that in the future we learned to commune with the ocean's greatest musicians!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_99
text_en: I think I'll like future music ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_100
text_en: I suppose that of all sea creatures, the octopus would definitely be the best musician.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_101
text_en: That sounds silly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_102
text_en: I wish I could tell you the future was that cool.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_103
text_en: what about whales? those beautiful voices would make them strong contenders too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_104
text_en: well ur there, so it's at least kind of cool

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_105
text_en: u sound silly

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_106
text_en: omg Amir's about to get a new high score in Ollie’s Crash Course! can't miss this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_107
text_en: ttyl ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_108
text_en: I think you left a fancy energy-blasting pistol thing here

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_109
text_en: Um, no. All my "fancy energy-blasting pistol things" are accounted for.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_110
text_en: Not mine. Try Quincy?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_111
text_en: oh. ok.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_112
text_en: enh, I guess I'll just leave it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_113
text_en: You seem upset. Is it something I said?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_114
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_115
text_en: I didn't love being called boring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_116
text_en: Oh. I really didn't mean anything by it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_117
text_en: Okay, I take it back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_118
text_en: honest?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_119
text_en: Honest. I'm sorry I upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_120
text_en: You're not boring, Aoi. I just thought I was being clever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_121
text_en: If you were really boring, I wouldn't be talking to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_122
text_en: I appreciate you saying that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_123
text_en: well u are pretty clever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_124
text_en: It seems the jury's convinced by your defense

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_125
text_en: sometimes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_126
text_en: and grants you a fresh start

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_127
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_128
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_129
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_130
text_en: Talk soon then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_131
text_en: Oh, I see Aoi's emoticons are back. I think that's a good sign.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_132
text_en: definitely!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_133
text_en: u bet. talk soon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_134
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_135
text_en: Is that all for now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_683
text_en: Probably best. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_684
text_en: until next time!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_136
text_en: should I ask u about the weather?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_137
text_en: I'd rather you didn't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_138
text_en: What, like, in space?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_139
text_en: then I guess that's all for now!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_140
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_141
text_en: Okay fine. Ask away.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_142
text_en: hmmm lemme think.........

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_143
text_en: how's the weather on venus? ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_144
text_en: Depends on what the coolant towers are up to

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_145
text_en: I'd have to check. Either kind of cold or super cold. Either way, cold.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_146
text_en: uuuuh coolant whatnows?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_147
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WUT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_148
text_en: isn't venus like... really hot?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_149
text_en: and surrounded by dense gas?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_150
text_en: I was joking. I thought venus couldn't sustain life lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_151
text_en: Oh yeah. I guess you're in the time when Venus was inhospitable... Wild.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_152
text_en: Ah right. In the future, the Orokin come along and invent coolant towers that cool Venus down.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_153
text_en: r uuuu messing with meee?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_154
text_en: I'll do you one better. These days, people with robotic body upgrades maintain the towers, and I get along great with them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_155
text_en: Not at all. I go there all the time. We created planet-cooling technology ages ago. Lol.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_156
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WHOA>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_157
text_en: cool! did we fix jupiter too?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_158
text_en: There's only so much one can do with a gas giant, but there are stations in its atmosphere.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_159
text_en: Well, what do you mean by "fix"? But not really.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_160
text_en: darn. I guess I'll live with that midnight mind-trap forever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_161
text_en: I'd be happy to help free you of that mind-trap if I can.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_162
text_en: Sorry, what kind of trap?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_163
text_en: u know when ur mind settles into the quiet of the night and starts pulling all kinds of crazy things from your subconscious as u try to sleep? mind-traps!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_164
text_en: Oh. Hah. Yeah, I know what you mean. You have one about Jupiter?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_165
text_en: I have no idea what you're talking about.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_166
text_en: oh ^_^ that's cool

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_167
text_en: Not that I'm judging. What's this Jupiter-related "mind-trap"?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_168
text_en: Should I be worried?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_169
text_en: gosh no! It's not like that. It's just... wow this is embarrassing heh

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_170
text_en: I'm gonna go

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_171
text_en: Hang on, I didn't mean to embarrass you. Sorry. Maybe I misunderstood.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_172
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_173
text_en: ^_^ it was just a roundabout way of saying I'm kinda scared of jupiter

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_174
text_en: which I guess sounds silly to a future-person who hangs out in its atmosphere like all the time...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_175
text_en: Not at all. Tell me more. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_176
text_en: Just a little.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_177
text_en: so ya I'm gonna go

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_178
text_en: Lettie told me if u fell into jupiter, u'd hit a point where the atmosphere is denser than ur body, so u'd bob up and down. stuck. forever falling then getting launched back up between densities

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_179
text_en: that is until u disintegrate! plus it's the size of like 1300 earths... long fall... long launch!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_180
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_OHNO>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_181
text_en: That's... terrifying.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_182
text_en: You'd die quickly anyway. Just your body would be floating there, not "you" exactly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_183
text_en: I don't know if this helps, but size is relative. Earth actually seems pretty small when you live in space.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_184
text_en: and it always will be! but it helps to talk about it :')

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_185
text_en: not super comforting, but I appreciate the effort

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_186
text_en: that is... oddly comforting

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_187
text_en: jupiter would be a nightmare even if it were the size of earth tho

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_188
text_en: it's not like I'm an astronaut anyway

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_189
text_en: A what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_190
text_en: Is that... another mind-trap?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_191
text_en: oh duh! I guess u wouldn't have astronauts anymore

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_192
text_en: the word's kinda meaningless when EVERYONE's an astronaut lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_193
text_en: So an astronaut is someone who lives in space?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_194
text_en: I still have no idea what you're talking about.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_195
text_en: an astronaut is someone who *explores* space. people can't live there yet, but we visit!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_196
text_en: That's pretty exciting. Humans are on the cusp of discovering so much, and you get to be right there to see it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_197
text_en: What's it like to be talking to a real live astronaut?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_198
text_en: :) that's a really cool way to look at it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_199
text_en: pretty cool ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_200
text_en: ummm... I've been enjoying our convo so much that I ignored the fancy energy-blasting pistol thing leaking some kinda green ooze onto the floor...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_201
text_en: it's starting to smell weird sooo

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo2_202
text_en: I'm gonna get Quincy to deal with that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_203
text_en: Yikes! Good luck.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo2_204
text_en: Oh man. Good idea!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_205
text_en: I spilled bubble tea on my PC pls tell me you got this message so I know everything works

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_206
text_en: Nope, it's ruined.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_207
text_en: You're safe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_208
text_en: phew. k thx that's all

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_209
text_en: Glad it worked out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_210
text_en: same. ok bye

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_211
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_212
text_en: and grants you a fresh start

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_213
text_en: I didn't love being called boring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_214
text_en: sometimes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_215
text_en: definitely!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_216
text_en: Oh, I see Aoi's emoticons are back. I think that's a good sign.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_217
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_218
text_en: You seem upset. Is it something I said?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_219
text_en: I appreciate you saying that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_220
text_en: You're not boring, Aoi. I just thought I was being clever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_221
text_en: Oh. I really didn't mean anything by it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_222
text_en: Honest. I'm sorry I upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_223
text_en: If you were really boring, I wouldn't be talking to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_224
text_en: well u are pretty clever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_225
text_en: u bet. talk soon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_226
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_227
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_228
text_en: It seems the jury's convinced by your defense

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_229
text_en: honest?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_230
text_en: Okay, I take it back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_231
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_232
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_233
text_en: Talk soon then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_234
text_en: What kind of tea did you say it was?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_235
text_en: omg thank all the gods. Amir would never have let me live that down

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_236
text_en: And just how did you spill tea all over your PC?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_237
text_en: bubble tea! it's a milky tea with chewy little tapioca pearls

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_238
text_en: So little of what you just said made sense to me, but I trust your taste.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_239
text_en: Sounds weird.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_240
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_JOY>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_241
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_ANNOYED1>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_242
text_en: Do you still have a few sips left at least?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_243
text_en: And this stuff nearly broke your PC?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_244
text_en: ok don't make fun of me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_245
text_en: I didn't have room on my desk so I sat my drink on the tower. then I was settling in, getting comfy

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_246
text_en: when I crossed my legs, my knee hit the bubble tea and BAM. Tea EVERYWHERE. Not a drop left in the cup!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_247
text_en: The weirdest part of that story was when you sat cross-legged at a computer desk.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_248
text_en: I'm having a really hard time not making fun of you right now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_249
text_en: I'll spare you the lecture about caring for your electronics.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_250
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_OHNO>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_251
text_en: pity meee! I only got like one sip and bubble tea's tough to come by around here!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_252
text_en: No chance of getting another tea from wherever you got that one then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_253
text_en: Okay, fair enough. That sucks. Silver lining is you didn't break anything though, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_254
text_en: I make it myself. gotta venture into scaldraville to find the ingredients tho

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_255
text_en: Yeah, I wouldn't do that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_256
text_en: I do love a silver lining ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_257
text_en: Hey, that's not so bad. I hear Scaldraville's beautiful this time of year.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_258
text_en: You must really like tea if you go to all that trouble.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_259
text_en: And we don't even have to tell Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_260
text_en: Lol. I thought you might.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_261
text_en: a little side quest never hurts! err... rarely hurts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_262
text_en: oh yah nothing beats that efervon smell in the air

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_263
text_en: nothing will stop me from treating myself ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_264
text_en: thank goodness ur so good at keeping secrets

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_265
text_en: knew I could count on u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_266
text_en: and o[' [ y]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_267
text_en: oh shio-[3eettq

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_268
text_en: aE  -[$TE) keyboa e rrrrd !!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_269
text_en: Looks like there was a little damage after all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_270
text_en: I think you'd better talk to Amir about fixing that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_272
text_en: I don't think typing is good for the keyboard at this point.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_273
text_en: I'd ask if you're okay over there but... it looks like replying will be difficult either way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_275
text_en: qq

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_277
text_en: GOT IT

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_278
text_en: What the heck happened?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_279
text_en: Oh! Got what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_280
text_en: Did Lettie's rats walk all over your keyboard or was that bubble tea damage?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_281
text_en: I simply separated the metal in the keyboard from the liquid (and tapioca) then rebuilt it ^_^ good as new!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_282
text_en: Wow you did that quickly too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_283
text_en: Damn, your powers are no joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_284
text_en: I'm surprised you didn't think of that sooner.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_285
text_en: you think? ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_286
text_en: aaw shucks ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_287
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_ANNOYED1>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_288
text_en: yah sooo I'm totally gonna go brag to Amir

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_289
text_en: I would, too. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo3_290
text_en: later!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_291
text_en: As you should.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo3_292
text_en: Alright then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_293
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_COOLARMSUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_294
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPYARMSUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_295
text_en: uh huh

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_296
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_THUMBSUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_297
text_en: Talk soon then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_298
text_en: Oh. I really didn't mean anything by it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_299
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_300
text_en: You're not boring, Aoi. I just thought I was being clever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_301
text_en: You seem upset. Is it something I said?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_302
text_en: Oh, I see Aoi's emoticons are back. I think that's a good sign.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_303
text_en: well u are pretty clever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_304
text_en: Honest. I'm sorry I upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_305
text_en: sometimes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_306
text_en: I appreciate you saying that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_307
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_308
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_309
text_en: Okay, I take it back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_310
text_en: honest?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_311
text_en: It seems the jury's convinced by your defense

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_312
text_en: I didn't love being called boring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_313
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_314
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_315
text_en: u bet. talk soon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_316
text_en: definitely!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_317
text_en: and grants you a fresh start

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_318
text_en: If you were really boring, I wouldn't be talking to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_319
text_en: a what now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_320
text_en: Is that like... a predasite?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_321
text_en: Right. You never would have seen an animal on Deimos. Predasites are like infested dogs with big ears. You'd love them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_322
text_en: Ah right. You wouldn't know. It's an animal on Deimos. Don't worry your pretty little head over it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_323
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_AOICAT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_324
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_DOG>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_325
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_AWHUG>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_326
text_en: big ears are always cute! u see predasites often? ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_327
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GLARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_328
text_en: easy there space cowboy

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_329
text_en: What's a space cowboy?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_330
text_en: Is that a 1999 Earth animal?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_331
text_en: ah right u wouldn't know. don't worry ur great big head over it ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_332
text_en: Point taken.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_726
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_333
text_en: Okay, relax.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_334
text_en: gladly!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_335
text_en: it was a thumbs up btw. that first emoticon.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_336
text_en: Thanks for clearing that up. LOL.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_337
text_en: Ah. It all makes sense now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_338
text_en: don't worry, space cowboy. u can always count on me to share the wonders of the past ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_339
text_en: Actually no. They're hard to get close to... and kinda violent.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_340
text_en: Yeah! I'm good at sneaking up on them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_341
text_en: aaand why are we sneaking up on wild animals exactly?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_342
text_en: pray tell, why do u need to get close to a wild animal on Deimos?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_343
text_en: I hunt them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_344
text_en: Conservation. I work to preserve Deimos wildlife.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_345
text_en: oh! that is so incredibly lovely ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_346
text_en: is there like... an over-population problem?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_347
text_en: I just don't like them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_348
text_en: That was a joke. I'm actually part of a program to conserve them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_349
text_en: oookaaaayyy

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_350
text_en: aaah u got me! that's lovely ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_351
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_352
text_en: I'm kidding! I actually conserve wildlife on Deimos.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_353
text_en: oh! LOL well then

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_354
text_en: that might be my new fave fact about u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_355
text_en: I'm glad you approve.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_356
text_en: Just wait until you learn even more about me ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_357
text_en: I'm glad ur not into hunting endangered animals <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_358
text_en: lol I look forward to it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_359
text_en: my first emoticon was supposed to be a thumbs up btw ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_360
text_en: Oh. Thanks for clearing that up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_361
text_en: Ah. It all makes sense now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_362
text_en: but I'm going to say it's a predasite from now on!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_363
text_en: Perfect :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_364
text_en: Lol. You do whatever you think is best.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_365
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TWOHUGS>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_366
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_KNIFE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_367
text_en: ur great at virtual hugs!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_368
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_OHNO>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_369
text_en: Only one can live. You or your furry companion. You must choose.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_370
text_en: Don't worry! I just chopped up a tasty meal for our furry companion.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_371
text_en: I'm even better at in-person hugs.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_372
text_en: So are you!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_373
text_en: I'm sure u are!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_374
text_en: aaaw <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_375
text_en: wut do u think is the secret to a perfect hug? ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_376
text_en: A great body.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_377
text_en: Sincerity.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_378
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_STARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_379
text_en: I couldn't agree more!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_380
text_en: ur a delight <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_381
text_en: I suppose that helps, ya

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_382
text_en: I appreciate ur insight!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_383
text_en: I don't like this game!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_384
text_en: oh ok! can I help?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_385
text_en: No way! I did all this work and now you want to steal the glory of serving the dish?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_386
text_en: Of course! Why don't you go ahead and serve the dish?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_387
text_en: oh :(

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_388
text_en: Bad news. He hates it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_389
text_en: Good news. He likes it!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_390
text_en: I would be honored!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_391
text_en: I bet we can make something yummy if we work together next time <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_392
text_en: so happy for u :')

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_393
text_en: I bet you're right. I'd like that :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_394
text_en: Nah, I work alone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_395
text_en: Thank you, thank you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_396
text_en: Not as happy as I am.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_397
text_en: done deal!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_398
text_en: oh okay :')

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_399
text_en: until next time, chef!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_400
text_en: I'll leave u to it, chef!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_401
text_en: I think he likes it!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_402
text_en: Uh oh. He hates it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_403
text_en: that must be cuz u made it with so much love ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_404
text_en: that's ok ^_^ u did ur best right? it's the thought that counts!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_405
text_en: thx for letting me help <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_406
text_en: Thanks for helping!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo4_407
text_en: My pleasure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo4_408
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_409
text_en: do you know where my On-lyne CD ended up?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_410
text_en: definitely!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_411
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_412
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_413
text_en: honest?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_414
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_415
text_en: Oh, I see Aoi's emoticons are back. I think that's a good sign.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_416
text_en: well u are pretty clever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_417
text_en: sometimes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_418
text_en: Honest. I'm sorry I upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_419
text_en: u bet. talk soon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_420
text_en: If you were really boring, I wouldn't be talking to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_421
text_en: Oh. I really didn't mean anything by it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_422
text_en: Okay, I take it back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_423
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_424
text_en: You're not boring, Aoi. I just thought I was being clever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_425
text_en: and grants you a fresh start

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_426
text_en: I didn't love being called boring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_427
text_en: I appreciate you saying that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_428
text_en: k

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_429
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_430
text_en: It seems the jury's convinced by your defense

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_431
text_en: Talk soon then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_432
text_en: You seem upset. Is it something I said?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_433
text_en: No idea.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_434
text_en: I'm sure there's another in that CD store you hang out in.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_435
text_en: if you need study material for that super ez hit pop song ur working on, all u need to do is ask

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_436
text_en: I'm getting the sense I hit a nerve with that whole four chord song thing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_437
text_en: Nah, I know what four chords on loop sound like already.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_685
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_ANNOYED1>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_438
text_en: aaalrighty. my search continues.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_686
text_en: maybe a little

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_687
text_en: I actually think it's cool how you see past the surface of pop music.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_688
text_en: Look, we aren't all going to like the same things.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_689
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_ANNOYED2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_690
text_en: clearly

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_691
text_en: I appreciate u saying that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_692
text_en: What is it that upset you? I'm not judging. I really want to know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_693
text_en: No worries. Hope you find your CD.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_694
text_en: hope u have a good day ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_695
text_en: well, nobody comes after punk songs for being three power chords, u know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_696
text_en: like sure, thrash out three chords and shout about making out with 10 blondes in a night. that's sooo cool. ur sooo real

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_697
text_en: but sing about being devoted to a girl? true luv? bringing people together at a party? now ur a sellout

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_698
text_en: uuh no offense to the 10 blondes. they can come to the party.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_699
text_en: No, I get it. It's the double standard that bothers you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_700
text_en: I think you might be overthinking this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_701
text_en: yes! like I enjoy rock as much as the next girl, but let's not pretend it's less produced than pop

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_702
text_en: Neither is better. They're just different flavors.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_703
text_en: You've thought a lot about this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_704
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_JOY>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_705
text_en: right!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_706
text_en: maybe

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_707
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_MUSIC2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_708
text_en: um... ok.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_709
text_en: I just mean you should like whatever you like. Screw what everyone else thinks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_710
text_en: I'm not trying to offend you or anything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_711
text_en: easier said than done

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_712
text_en: how considerate of u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_713
text_en: Fair enough.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_714
text_en: True, and you deserve people in your corner who understand your point of view either way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_715
text_en: thx for the advice, I guess

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_716
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY1>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_717
text_en: that sounds nice

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_718
text_en: I'll do my best to be one of those people.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_719
text_en: Yeah, it's tough out there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_720
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_721
text_en: I'm gonna get back to finding my CD. thx for the chat

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_722
text_en: Okay, I had that coming.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_723
text_en: Come on, Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_724
text_en: i'm gonna get back to finding my CD. have a good one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_725
text_en: i'm gonna go. not trying to offend u or anything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_439
text_en: I figure u might have borrowed it <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> being a fan and all

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_440
text_en: No, sorry

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_441
text_en: Nope. Can you track it down with your metal powers?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_442
text_en: no hard feelings

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_443
text_en: (Amir tells me there are no CDs in the future so)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_444
text_en: I don't think Zeke would approve of stealing. (No, I didn't take it. Lol.)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_445
text_en: There are no CD players either, so even if I had it, I wouldn't be able to do much with it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_446
text_en: darn.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_447
text_en: do rats like shiny things? maybe Lettie's rat took it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_448
text_en: LOL I wish!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_449
text_en: the CD's plastic anyway

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_450
text_en: Oh... Well, metal makes a big comeback in the future

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_451
text_en: That's too bad. I'm out of ideas.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_452
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_CHEEKY>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_453
text_en: it's the thought that counts ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_454
text_en: then I will dominate the future!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_455
text_en: Maybe the rat's an On-lyne fan too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_456
text_en: Haha I actually think they do. Not sure they could carry a CD in their little paws though.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_457
text_en: we have a primary suspect!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_458
text_en: Jokes aside, I really hope you find it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo1_459
text_en: Well, good luck with your search.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_460
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_461
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo1_462
text_en: thx!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_463
text_en: It seems the jury's convinced by your defense

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_464
text_en: definitely!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_465
text_en: there now you know

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_466
text_en: and grants you a fresh start

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_467
text_en: You're not boring, Aoi. I just thought I was being clever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_468
text_en: Talk soon then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_469
text_en: Honest. I'm sorry I upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_470
text_en: Oh. I really didn't mean anything by it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_471
text_en: You seem upset. Is it something I said?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_472
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_473
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_474
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_475
text_en: honest?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_476
text_en: Arthur says you owe him a drink

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_477
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_478
text_en: u bet. talk soon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_479
text_en: Okay, I take it back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_480
text_en: Oh, I see Aoi's emoticons are back. I think that's a good sign.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_481
text_en: I appreciate you saying that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_482
text_en: sometimes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_483
text_en: If you were really boring, I wouldn't be talking to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_484
text_en: well u are pretty clever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_485
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_486
text_en: I didn't love being called boring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_487
text_en: as a peace offering

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_488
text_en: something about him "saving your ass"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_489
text_en: cause I told him we both think he sucks for making fun of me being an On-lyne fan ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_490
text_en: Good! He's not getting that drink.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_491
text_en: Oh you really told him that? Hah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_492
text_en: Arthur's all talk anyway ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_493
text_en: anytime!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_494
text_en: Well, thanks for the heads up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_495
text_en: So, what is the deal between the two of you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_496
text_en: u could say we're co-workers

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_497
text_en: with history

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_498
text_en: Does that mean what I think it means?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_499
text_en: History, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_500
text_en: probably

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_501
text_en: of the ancient variety

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_502
text_en: let's just say Arthur and I have been strictly professional since On-lyne's second world tour

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_503
text_en: So, what happened?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_504
text_en: You want to to tell me how Arthur screwed that up?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_505
text_en: that's a tale for another day

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_506
text_en: and a few too many drinks

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_507
text_en: Hey, you don't have to tell me anything you don't want to tell me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_508
text_en: Shame. I'm curious.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_509
text_en: I appreciate you saying that <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_510
text_en: ur strong. u'll be ok

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_511
text_en: ur the best

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_512
text_en: Ha well... He's not wrong.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_513
text_en: Tell him he can shove it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_514
text_en: Tell him he owes *me* a drink for putting up with him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_515
text_en: is this like a fun tit-for-tat thing or like an actual frustration thing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_516
text_en: It's frustration.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_517
text_en: It's all good fun, don't worry haha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_518
text_en: wanna talk about it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_519
text_en: gosh. mean humor is so confusing

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_520
text_en: Nah, it's fine. Just having an off day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_521
text_en: I just have a lot going on, but that's true for all of us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_522
text_en: Not your style?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_523
text_en: Eh, it's all about intent.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_524
text_en: nah but it's cool if it's yours!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_525
text_en: so... if the intent is to show the person you like them u tell them u don't like them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_526
text_en: It only works if everyone knows each other well enough to understand where the lines are. Getting close to the line without crossing it shows you’re comfortable with each other.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_527
text_en: Sure. Let's go with that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_528
text_en: take ur frustration out on the bad guys! that's what I do ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_529
text_en: ok :) no pressure

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_530
text_en: but u know, there really is a lot weighing on u. That might be true for all of us, but it doesn’t make ur experience any less real

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_531
text_en: I just hope u know it’s okay to have off days

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_532
text_en: Making a mental note not to joke around with you like that then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_533
text_en: Good, because I'm definitely going to joke around with you like that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_534
text_en: :) I like u more all the time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_535
text_en: u and Arthur are more alike aaall the tiiime

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_536
text_en: Thanks for saying that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_537
text_en: Sounds like you might be speaking from experience.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_538
text_en: Is that meant to be a compliment?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_539
text_en: I thought mean humor wasn't your style ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_541
text_en: anytime <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_542
text_en: ha. u ever met anyone who arrived in Höllvania emotionally stable?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_543
text_en: I’ll just leave it at that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_544
text_en: You're more insightful than you let on.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_545
text_en: All right, we'll leave it at that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_546
text_en: a girl's gotta have her secrets

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_547
text_en: anyway

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_548
text_en: thx for caring about us in the hex. it doesn't go unnoticed. really.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_549
text_en: I appreciate your very clinical explanation of how comedy works

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_550
text_en: that is hella confusing to me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_551
text_en: (not sarcasm)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_552
text_en: I hope he knows he's not getting it. ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_553
text_en: but what matters is it makes sense to you and Arthur!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_554
text_en: Arthur really does want that drink tho lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_555
text_en: And what do you want? You're saving people all the time too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_556
text_en: that's the spirit :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_557
text_en: hmmmm good question

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_558
text_en: I'd settle for a new stereo and world peace

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_559
text_en: I'll see what I can do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_560
text_en: That's a tall order.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_561
text_en: my hero

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_562
text_en: in the wise words of Drillbit, "dream big. then hustle."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_563
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_564
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_565
text_en: Can target practice wait until tomorrow? I beg of you! I'm trying to sleep!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_566
text_en: uh... that message was meant for Quincy. sry... pls ignore this

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_567
text_en: Quincy's gunshots keeping you up?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_568
text_en: Sounds like you're having a tough time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_569
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_570
text_en: well u are pretty clever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_571
text_en: Okay, I take it back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_572
text_en: I didn't love being called boring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_573
text_en: I appreciate you saying that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_574
text_en: Oh, I see Aoi's emoticons are back. I think that's a good sign.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_575
text_en: u bet. talk soon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_576
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_577
text_en: sometimes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_578
text_en: It seems the jury's convinced by your defense

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_579
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_580
text_en: If you were really boring, I wouldn't be talking to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_581
text_en: You seem upset. Is it something I said?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_582
text_en: definitely!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_583
text_en: no srsly. u can ignore this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_584
text_en: and grants you a fresh start

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_585
text_en: You're not boring, Aoi. I just thought I was being clever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_586
text_en: Talk soon then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_587
text_en: Honest. I'm sorry I upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_588
text_en: Oh. I really didn't mean anything by it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_589
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_590
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_591
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_592
text_en: honest?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_593
text_en: it's fiiine. this is a big mall. I can always find somewhere further from Quincy to nap

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_594
text_en: I'm sure he doesn't need to shoot things at *all* hours.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_595
text_en: You can still message him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_596
text_en: nah it's for the best that I didn't reach him. he needs to let off steam. I get it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_597
text_en: I can say something to Arthur for you, if you want.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_598
text_en: That's kind of you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_599
text_en: As long as you're getting enough sleep, that's cool.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_600
text_en: uh... I appreciate the thought, but if that was a good idea, I'd talk to Arthur myself :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_601
text_en: why thank u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_602
text_en: u wouldn't believe how cozy clothing stores can be

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_603
text_en: Hey, I get it. I'd never tell Ordis how his jokes keep me up sometimes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_604
text_en: You should really look out for yourself more though.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_605
text_en: Ordis a friend of urs?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_606
text_en: who says I don't?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_607
text_en: You're always thinking about other people. I hope you don't forget about yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_608
text_en: Maybe I overstepped. It wasn't really my place to say that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_609
text_en: I say you don't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_610
text_en: Yeah, he's the Cephalon intelligence that runs my spacecraft.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_611
text_en: No, he's the Cephalon intelligence that runs my spacecraft.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_612
text_en: a Cephalon is like a... wut exactly?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_613
text_en: They're like a digital intelligence.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_614
text_en: They're people whose consciousness was uploaded to virtual space (usually by force.)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_615
text_en: oh! like a robot

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_616
text_en: :) I'll have nightmares about that now

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_617
text_en: I suppose.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_618
text_en: But without a body.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_619
text_en: Damn. There I go sabotaging your sleep further.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_620
text_en: ... Oops.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_621
text_en: only hella futuristic

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_622
text_en: oh! like the internet

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_623
text_en: u and Quincy are quite the pair :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_624
text_en: kidding I'll survive lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_625
text_en: You get the idea.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_626
text_en: Maybe a little too futuristic to explain, honestly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_627
text_en: Ordis is okay. Trust me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_628
text_en: Your reaction to things that were normal to the Orokin is a good reality check for me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_629
text_en: well Ordis is lucky to have u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_630
text_en: He knows. Lol.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_631
text_en: And I'm very lucky to have him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_632
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_CHEEKY>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_633
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY1>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_634
text_en: I just don't see looking out for others as separate from looking out for myself
