name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_635
text_en: I just don't see looking out for others as separate from looking out for myself

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_636
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GLARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_637
text_en: ew I feel like I need to shower after reading that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_638
text_en: maybe we both need to sleep and reset, ya?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_639
text_en: Surely there are exceptions to that rule.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_640
text_en: How so?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_641
text_en: What about people you don't respect?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_642
text_en: it comes down to respect

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_643
text_en: I respect others too much to accept bad behavior from them and respect myself too much to tolerate it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_644
text_en: Sounds like you're tolerating bad behavior from Quincy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_645
text_en: why? wondering how I might feel about u? ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_646
text_en: u mean target practice? I dunno. sounds like u have a low bar for bad behavior lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_647
text_en: I am now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_648
text_en: Don't evade the question.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_649
text_en: You know what I mean.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_650
text_en: I'm talking about him ignoring the needs of those around him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_651
text_en: I respect u enough to let you find ur own answers to existential questions

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_652
text_en: very well

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_653
text_en: my respect is freely given, but it can be lost

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_654
text_en: when that happens, I just stop caring and treat the person like anything else that holds no importance to me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_655
text_en: anyway none of this cheery talk concerns Quincy :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_656
text_en: No, but it does concern you, so it interests me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_657
text_en: Yeah, I guess not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_658
text_en: oh u <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_659
text_en: time for me to go find a nice place to sleep

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_660
text_en: Good luck

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_661
text_en: Sweet dreams

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_662
text_en: sure, he shoots at odd hours, but I see ignoring it as a chance to do something kind for someone who truly deserves it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_663
text_en: All right, then. It's clear I can't convince you otherwise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo3_664
text_en: Your outlook does have a certain charm to it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_665
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SWEAT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_666
text_en: how'd this get so intense?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_667
text_en: anyway...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo3_668
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY1>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_669
text_en: the future sounds srsly awesome

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_670
text_en: well, you'd better get back out there and save the world or whatever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_671
text_en: I think you mean save the universe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_672
text_en: Never a dull moment.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_673
text_en: the multiverse even

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_674
text_en: take care of yourself, k?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_675
text_en: totally!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_676
text_en: On-lyne makes it look ez, but pop music takes a lot of skill.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_677
text_en: Yeah, the skill of playing the same four chords... over and over...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank1Convo1_678
text_en: True. Making it seem effortless is actually part of the challenge.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_679
text_en: exactly!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_680
text_en: let's talk after you've written your hit song, maestro :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_681
text_en: should be ez

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank1Convo1_682
text_en: hey, you're great at curing boredom :) thx

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1763
text_en: A much heavier shawzin?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1764
text_en: Yeah, an instrument like my Shawzin.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1765
text_en: oh oh OH! the Shawzin, my ears yearn!  won't you play for me one day?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1766
text_en: I promise I will.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1767
text_en: I can't - I never really learned.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1768
text_en: oh that's ok that's okay, anyway - piano

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1769
text_en: i'm holding you do that! <RETRO_EMOJI_THUMBSUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_727
text_en: u spend a lot of time in that backroom.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_728
text_en: honest?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_729
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_730
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_731
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_732
text_en: Oh. I really didn't mean anything by it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_733
text_en: Honest. I'm sorry I upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_734
text_en: Talk soon then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_735
text_en: You're not boring, Aoi. I just thought I was being clever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_736
text_en: and grants you a fresh start

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_737
text_en: definitely!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_738
text_en: You seem upset. Is it something I said?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_739
text_en: If you were really boring, I wouldn't be talking to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_740
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_741
text_en: It seems the jury's convinced by your defense

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_742
text_en: sometimes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_743
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_744
text_en: u bet. talk soon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_745
text_en: Oh, I see Aoi's emoticons are back. I think that's a good sign.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_746
text_en: I appreciate you saying that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_747
text_en: I didn't love being called boring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_748
text_en: Okay, I take it back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_749
text_en: well u are pretty clever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_750
text_en: how is my roguish perfectionist today?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_751
text_en: Just perfect. And roguish.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_752
text_en: Thanks for checking in. I'm doing fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_753
text_en: Never been better.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_754
text_en: our mysterious hero from the future! u doing well?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_755
text_en: Mysteriously well.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_756
text_en: Thanks for checking in. I'm doing fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_757
text_en: Never been better.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_758
text_en: how are u today? not being too hard on urself, I hope

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_759
text_en: how is my fave time traveler?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_760
text_en: Me? Hard on myself? Never.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_761
text_en: Thanks for checking in. I'm doing fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_762
text_en: Never been better.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_763
text_en: I'm all right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_764
text_en: Thanks for checking in. I'm doing fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_765
text_en: Never been better.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_766
text_en: pinky swear?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_767
text_en: pinky swear?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_768
text_en: Pinky swear.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_769
text_en: Cute. Lol. Okay, I admit it. I've had better days.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_770
text_en: I don't think pinky swears work online.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_771
text_en: good I just wanted to make sure <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_772
text_en: I see <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_773
text_en: then swear on something important to u!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_774
text_en: I can't do that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_775
text_en: I swear on the Lotus.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_776
text_en: I swear on Duviri.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_777
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WHOA>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_778
text_en: cuz u lied?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_779
text_en: ^_^ ok I believe u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1770
text_en: so there's sort of this song here that anyone who has been around a piano knows, called 'Soul & Heart'

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_780
text_en: Okay, I confess. I've had better days.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_781
text_en: No, because this is dumb.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_782
text_en: Can't you just accept I'm fine?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_783
text_en: I appreciate ur honesty <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_784
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_STARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_785
text_en: a suspiciously curt answer but ok

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_786
text_en: anything I can do to make ur day better?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_787
text_en: You could tell me a joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_788
text_en: Please send flowers.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_789
text_en: Pretty lady like you? I can think of a few things. ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_790
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SWEAT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_791
text_en: knock knock

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_792
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_FLOWERS>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_793
text_en: Who's there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_794
text_en: Aoi, is that you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_795
text_en: nope! :) it's...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_796
text_en: med pack

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_797
text_en: Thanks. I feel better already.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_798
text_en: Wow a whole bouquet!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_799
text_en: glad you like them ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_800
text_en: Med pack who?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_801
text_en: Why? Who's been injured?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_802
text_en: med pack ur bags. we're going to the future!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_803
text_en: Lol! Excellent joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_804
text_en: I'll take it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_805
text_en: a joke inspired by u! ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_806
text_en: a joke inspired by u! ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_807
text_en: hope u don't mind me getting a bit serious for a sec

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_808
text_en: I see u pushing yourself for others without ever asking for anything in return

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_809
text_en: so I just wanna say, if u ever want to share some those burdens u carry, I'm always here

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_810
text_en: I appreciate you saying that, Aoi. I'll keep it in mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_811
text_en: You should deal with your own issues before trying to take on someone else's.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo4_812
text_en: I bet you say that to everyone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_813
text_en: ^_^ ok enough serious talk for now

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_814
text_en: I don't think we can help ourselves without helping others too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_815
text_en: only the people I care about

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_816
text_en: but that's a topic for another time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_817
text_en: I'll leave u with that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo4_818
text_en: may the rest of ur day be lovely

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1771
text_en: it's a two person song though, just a few notes <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_819
text_en: So, what's the situation with the metal cranes you make?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_820
text_en: Would you be willing to make me a metal crane?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_821
text_en: well u are pretty clever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_822
text_en: they're nothing fancy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_823
text_en: I appreciate you saying that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_824
text_en: Oh, I see Aoi's emoticons are back. I think that's a good sign.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_825
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_826
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_827
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_828
text_en: It seems the jury's convinced by your defense

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_829
text_en: You're not boring, Aoi. I just thought I was being clever.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_830
text_en: Honest. I'm sorry I upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_831
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_832
text_en: If you were really boring, I wouldn't be talking to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_833
text_en: and grants you a fresh start

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_834
text_en: I didn't love being called boring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_835
text_en: sometimes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_836
text_en: definitely!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_837
text_en: You seem upset. Is it something I said?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_838
text_en: Okay, I take it back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_839
text_en: u bet. talk soon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_840
text_en: honest?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_841
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_842
text_en: Talk soon then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_843
text_en: Oh. I really didn't mean anything by it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_844
text_en: they're pretty! and fun! most importantly...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_845
text_en: I suppoooose I would, but they're really for me ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_846
text_en: 1000 cranes grant a wish!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1772
text_en: Do you need a partner?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_847
text_en: I thought that was for *paper* cranes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_848
text_en: What? Where did you hear that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_849
text_en: oh yes but *metal* cranes are even more magical (I like to think)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_850
text_en: I thought it was common knowledge!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_851
text_en: Haha, let's hope so.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_852
text_en: That's really cool.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_853
text_en: That's ridiculous.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_854
text_en: I've never heard that in my life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_855
text_en: First I'm hearing of this. I'd love to know more.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_856
text_en: Actually, come to think of it, I think I did hear that once.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_857
text_en: That doesn't sound real, but if it makes you happy, that's cool.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_858
text_en: I'm sure! cranes have a proven track record, u know

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_859
text_en: ^_^ I'm glad u think so!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_860
text_en: wasn't too ridiculous for the Jipangu space program!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_861
text_en: then allow me to fill u in ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_862
text_en: allow me to grant ur wish ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_863
text_en: oh excellent! who couldn't use a wish, right? it's a lovely notion

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_864
text_en: lol ok

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_865
text_en: before Jipangu trained their astronauts to go to space, they had candidates fold 1000 cranes. true story!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_866
text_en: it's just what it sounds like! when u fold 1000 cranes, ur supposed to get a wish. traditionally, people fold paper, but I'm sure folding metal works just as well lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_867
text_en: I doubt that was because of some superstition. They were probably just testing concentration or something like that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_868
text_en: Ah, interesting. Skill-testing and luck-building all in one. Very wise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_869
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_ANNOYED1>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_870
text_en: "some superstition"?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_871
text_en: ya! ^_^ u get it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_872
text_en: You heard me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_873
text_en: I don't mean that as a bad thing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_874
text_en: so like did u just ask about my cranes to make fun of me ooor... ?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_875
text_en: oki doki

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_876
text_en: Maybe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_877
text_en: Of course not.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_878
text_en: alrighty then

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_879
text_en: So, how many have you folded by now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_880
text_en: I've seen you fold a lot. Have you gotten to 1000 before?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_881
text_en: a few hundred. I have a tally tucked away somewhere between all my CDs lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_882
text_en: actually yes! that wish wasn't for me though. time I get a wish for myself, dontcha think?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_883
text_en: How do you not have a precise number? I thought you'd have that memorized haha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_884
text_en: What will you wish for?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_885
text_en: no way! focusing on the end is just overwhelming. the trick is to focus on the moment. one step at a time! then one day u look around and go "oh look at that I'm done" ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_886
text_en: if I tell u, it won't come tru!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_887
text_en: Ah, so you're pacing yourself. I guess I can see how raw numbers can take away from the creativity.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_888
text_en: Seems super inefficient to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_889
text_en: My mistake! I should have thought of that. Be sure not to tell me!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_890
text_en: I don't think that rule applies to wishes made of metal and paper.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_891
text_en: I couldn't have said it better! ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_892
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_893
text_en: ok! I do love a wish guardian ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_894
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GLARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_895
text_en: well, the good news is when u fold ur 1000 cranes, u can track them however u want!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_896
text_en: I'm not gonna risk it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_897
text_en: Oh yeah? What lucky someone got that wish?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_898
text_en: Where's my wish?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_899
text_en: weeeell it's not a very cheery tale. I'd rather not get into it right now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_900
text_en: cranes don't have to be metal. go on, start folding that paper! ^_^ or metal, if u prefer! (tho I think u'll find that much harder)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_901
text_en: Oh. Hey, I'm sorry to hear that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_902
text_en: Are you sure? I'd really like to hear it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_903
text_en: Will you show me how?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_904
text_en: But I want YOU to make my cranes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_905
text_en: it's all good <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_906
text_en: yes I'm sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_907
text_en: I'd be happy to <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_908
text_en: gosh my whole "these cranes are a deeply personal symbol of growth for me and take a heck of a lot of time to make" thing went right over ur head, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_909
text_en: This next wish will be better anyway :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_910
text_en: Whatever happened, I think it's cool that you're making a wish for yourself. Turning it into something happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_911
text_en: Won't you reconsider telling me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_912
text_en: I just thought that time might be better spent on me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_913
text_en: Oh... Okay, yes it did. My bad.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_914
text_en: ^_^ ur making my heart feel very full

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_915
text_en: if this is a joke, I don't find it very funny

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_916
text_en: all is forgiven

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_917
text_en: I think I'm beginning to understand you a lot better.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_918
text_en: Hey, I appreciate you telling me about your cranes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_919
text_en: That's a relief.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_920
text_en: You're pretty cool, Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_921
text_en: I'm just glad you're doing what makes you happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_922
text_en: haha I hope so

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_923
text_en: Good!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_924
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_925
text_en: nah I just wear cool shades

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_926
text_en: back atcha ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_927
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SUNGLASSES>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_928
text_en: ^_^ it's the one best way

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_929
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_930
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SMITTEN>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_931
text_en: hey, it was cool of u to show interest :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_932
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPYARMSUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_933
text_en: Next time I see you folding those cranes, I'll have a whole new appreciation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo5_934
text_en: I've gotta run, but I'll be sending you energy for all that crane-folding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_935
text_en: and next time I see you seeing me fold cranes, I'll have an appreciation for ur appreciation heehee

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo5_936
text_en: wow! I can feel ur energy flowing through the cosmos already <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1773
text_en: Are you offering to be my teacher, Ms. Aoi?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo6_937
text_en: Hey Aoi! You like Amir, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo6_938
text_en: You're a fan of games, right Aoi?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_939
text_en: yeah!! y?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_940
text_en: like what kind?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo6_941
text_en: Amir's trying to get a game of "Fables & Frontiers" together. It's a board game where everybody makes characters and plays pretend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo6_942
text_en: Amir's trying to get a game of "Fables & Frontiers" together. It's a game where we all tell a story together and use chance to add some excitement to it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_943
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_STARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_944
text_en: ooooo that sounds fun!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_945
text_en: like what kind of play pretend? ... r people gonna make fun of me for playing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo6_946
text_en: Eh, it's just a silly game. It's a waste of time but I'm trying to be nice.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo6_947
text_en: If they do, they'll have to go through me. <RETRO_EMOJI_KNIFE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo6_948
text_en: Who cares? It'll be fun! And it'll mean a lot to Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_949
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HORRIFIED>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_950
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_OHNO>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_951
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_952
text_en: count me in!! oh oh oh do you think he'll let me play a character that has pets?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_953
text_en: ... i think i'm good...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo6_954
text_en: LOL. I think you can play as a druid, yeah. They have familiars. Like cats and things.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo6_955
text_en: I'm sure you can.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_956
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_AOICAT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo6_957
text_en: i think it'll mean the world to amir to have everybody around the table playing... he's like me. big heart <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1760
text_en: Yes, Aoi?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1774
text_en: You don't seem like you'd be a good teacher.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1775
text_en: i was thinking it could be fun - find a piano in some abandoned store, if it has metal i can move it carefully..

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1776
text_en: Are pianos made of metal?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_958
text_en: The feeling's mutual.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank2Convo2_959
text_en: I bet you say that to all the time travellers.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_960
text_en: lucky me ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_961
text_en: just the charming ones

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank2Convo2_962
text_en: don't let Arthur give you too much trouble, k?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1777
text_en: I'd love to see that!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1782
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WHOA>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1778
text_en: maybe i can teach you not to be so rude. forget it - your loss.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1783
text_en: Ms. Aoi reporting for duty. First lesson: piano lesson!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_963
text_en: I wanted to ask you something about Transference. <RETRO_EMOJI_WUT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1784
text_en: first up: there's lots of keys. 88 last i counted. each one makes a noise. doh rei mi fa...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_964
text_en: Can we talk about Transference?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_965
text_en: go on... u mean when you 'wear' a warframe? like the thing i am or becoming, i guess?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_966
text_en: Yeah. I don't want to make things weird, but I need to know where you stand. Does it bother you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_967
text_en: Does it make you uncomfortable?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_968
text_en: I think the Kind answer to give you is the honest one... .. no. It doesn't at all. BUT it could. If I didn't... know you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_969
text_en: hmm because it's you? no. no it doesn't not at all. i mean it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_970
text_en: I think the Kind answer to give you is the honest one... .. no. It doesn't at all. BUT it could. If I didn't... know you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_971
text_en: hmm because it's you? no. no it doesn't not at all. i mean it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_972
text_en: because I trust you. I trust you wouldn't do anything I wouldn't do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_973
text_en: Is there anything you wouldn't do?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_974
text_en: The killing doesn't bother you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_975
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WUT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_976
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_KNIFE> that's NOT what I said. of course it bothers me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1779
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_STARE> i don't know actually, BUT

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_977
text_en: of course. the list is so long

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_978
text_en: but, i trust u wouldn't do anything i wouldn't do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1780
text_en: me too, the guys would freak!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_979
text_en: i wouldn't leave someone behind if i could save them

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_980
text_en: so if that means something gets killed, it's because it had to happen

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_981
text_en: i wuldn't accept a no-win scenario

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_982
text_en: So you believe in means to an end?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_983
text_en: We agree on that!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_984
text_en: shoooooooooould i keep going? i can do this all year

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_985
text_en: Please. Continue.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_986
text_en: I get it, I get it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_987
text_en: i wouldn't spend my downtime trying to see if my partner was testing my values

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_988
text_en: are you surrrrrrre? do you not trust me like i trust u?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_989
text_en: none of that bs pls, i don't prescribe to 1 way to look at the world. life is complicated.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_990
text_en: then rrllyyy... why are you asking this? what are you asking?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_991
text_en: and the least we can do is face the complications with an open heart and smile.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_992
text_en: don't u see how impossible it is for me right now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_993
text_en: no one asked to be born. but here we are.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_994
text_en: none of my relationship magazines talk about this kind of thing!!!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_995
text_en: but because we're here, let's leave the place a tiny bit better than we found it, right? and stop people from making it worse!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_996
text_en: "So the love of my life can take over my body and make me do whatever they want, even kill. a lot"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_997
text_en: goooooooot it? ur smart enough to get it. i think.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_998
text_en: the reason i'm ok with that is because i TRUST u.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_999
text_en: I trust you too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_1000
text_en: Aren't you worried that I could do bad things? Go Rogue?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1001
text_en: do u trust me enough to let me take u out for a spin? if i could, that is.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1002
text_en: this isn't funny even at all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1003
text_en: i'm not sure what you are playing at. are these mind games?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1004
text_en: picture it. me... controlling you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1005
text_en: would you let me? in a fight, in an average day...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_1006
text_en: I'm the best there is at those.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1781
text_en: in any case - partner. for one song. could be fun right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_1007
text_en: No, no, sorry. I just don't know how to approach our ... situation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1008
text_en: someone else can find that out. this? is game over.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1009
text_en: umm dummy no one does? maybe ur picking a fight with me here cause u know i could whoop u out there!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_1010
text_en: Maybe if you told me a little more... detail ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_1011
text_en: Yes. No hesitation.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1012
text_en: good. cause i might even be better than u at bein' u.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1013
text_en: oh i seeeee ur little game here, hmm... well i'd start with hmmm... the tight suit can go. ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1014
text_en: picture it... boss AOI!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_1015
text_en: You're the boss.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo6_1016
text_en:
and as BOSS AOI I have a demand:

never doubt my trust in you.
and don't give me a reason to doubt yours. ok? ok. boss out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo6_1017
text_en: I wouldn't dare [End].

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1785
text_en: oh jeeze, music should not make you think of such things. no fear. only Soul & Heart.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1018
text_en: k i knoooow this is sudden but

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1019
text_en: do u think kindness is a weakness?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1020
text_en: like a for real weakness <RETRO_EMOJI_KNIFE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1021
text_en: The strongest people I know are kind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1022
text_en: I do. I think you need to be ready to be unkind to the world to be strong.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1023
text_en: Like you, Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1786
text_en: Doh Rei Mi Fa? This is sounding like Void Tongue...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1024
text_en: Like Ordis. He really feels like my first friend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1025
text_en: hmm ok let's see why, i haven't always loved the answers to this. but... go on, m'dear <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1026
text_en: Think of it this way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1027
text_en: Well, I have a feeling you're the real boss around here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1028
text_en: You're the first to think of others.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1029
text_en: And not just my boss ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1030
text_en: And others think they are kind. But there is a difference between NICE and KIND.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1031
text_en: I mean Arthur can bark orders, other's can heal and kill.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1032
text_en: Kindness makes you vulnerable, but not weak. You have the kindest heart of anyone I've met in my travels.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1033
text_en: But if any of us had to choose, I bet we would listen to you first if it came down to it because you'd choose something out of kindness.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1034
text_en: I bet you'd find a way to get this whole shitshow solved and not hurt anybody, and if someone got hurt, someone you knew. They'd understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1035
text_en: hmmm... go on <RETRO_EMOJI_SNEAKY>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1036
text_en: Uhh.. umm. Be extra kind and just accept what I said?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1037
text_en: Well... if I must...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1038
text_en: Fine.... just this once. <RETRO_EMOJI_TWOHUGS>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1039
text_en: I can learn from you. I am learning from you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1040
text_en: And that truly means that whatever happens next.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1041
text_en: Whatever I'm up against, I won't be alone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1042
text_en: take me with you anywhere.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1043
text_en: I already do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1044
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1045
text_en: Ordisss, his name did sound kinda scary but... i like a kind friend!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1046
text_en: tell me about him! <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1047
text_en: Wow he kind of looks exactly like that...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1048
text_en: ORDIS ARMY !!!! <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE> <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE> <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE> <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE> <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1049
text_en: He is the best there is. He's seen me through it all and still greets me with a joke. THAT is kindness.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1050
text_en: that probably means a lot - being able to look at who you are, what u've been through, and have someone make u laugh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1051
text_en: He might be kind but an army of Ordis ... well, it wouldn't lose. To anything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1052
text_en: Look out world.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1053
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE> <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1054
text_en: March march march march march! <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1055
text_en: but Ordis...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1056
text_en: Yeah. Ordis. He wasn't always kind though, at least I don't think. Maybe one day he can tell you himself. His story.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1057
text_en: i would... love that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1058
text_en: Do you want me to make you laugh more?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1059
text_en: Let me try one of his jokes on you. As a kind favour. Ahem.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1060
text_en: nah, i love what we have. don't change a thing. MUAH. xoxo

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1061
text_en: but here's a good joke. Arthur needs me to hunt down a Scaldra. Ha. buhbuzzz

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1062
text_en: If I may say, operator, your chosen warframe..suits you! Ha. Ha.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1063
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_ANNOYED2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1064
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_ANNOYED1>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1065
text_en: I .......... don't get itttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1066
text_en: On second thought... yeah let me work on my material [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1067
text_en: unkind to the world? <RETRO_EMOJI_HORRIFIED> what do you mean?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1068
text_en: I mean exactly that. Kindness is weak in many ways. The world will often remind you of this.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1069
text_en: Think about it - the only way to get anything done is often when someone else gets hurt.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1070
text_en: i just don't see how you can think that, hasn't the world shown you kindness?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1071
text_en: w..where is this coming from?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1072
text_en: Once. With you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1073
text_en: Never. I am where I am because of powerful and unkind people.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1787
text_en: Please don't put this on the test, Ms. Aoi!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1074
text_en: i can't be the only one - i can't!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1075
text_en: To me you're the only one whos kindness matters. Like you didn't want something from me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1076
text_en: You are. And that kindness means you know when I might just need a minute [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1077
text_en: i don't want anything from you! none of us do, really. you're not seriously saying that me being kind has confirmed somehow it is a weakness??? are you for real?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1078
text_en: I think I am, for now. Who knows - you can prove me wrong.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1079
text_en: I don't think you're weak.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1080
text_en: i... thought i already had. i can't do this anymore. we're thru. i'm sorry

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1081
text_en: read what you said... you basically did tho... seriously. read the words RIGHT THERE. you said them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1082
text_en: I mean it. I don't think you're weak.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1083
text_en: I think it just occurred to me... you're stronger than me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1084
text_en: You're everything I'm not... which is why I wanted us to be a thing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1085
text_en: well let's stay a thing, and tell me how we can get this feeling sorted one day. i'll always be here for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1086
text_en: Think about it - the only way to get anything done is often when someone else gets hurt.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1087
text_en: you have seen so much pain. i can't imagine. i just can't imagine. i wish i knew you sooner.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1088
text_en: You're too kind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1089
text_en: which mean's... i'm too weak.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1090
text_en: That's not what I meant, Aoi...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1091
text_en: Knowing your weakness is part of what makes you survive.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1092
text_en: well wut DID you mean exactly?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1093
text_en: I'm sorry, I shouldn't have said anything. I don't think you're weak at all [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1094
text_en: this was... connnfussssssssssing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1095
text_en: sure... survive. ok. is that all this is? surviving? do humans do everything just to survive?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1096
text_en: It's what I've been doing, or at least it feels like it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1097
text_en: maybeee you're in a dark place. a lot has happened, to all of us. but i can be your light. that's why we are what we are. together.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1098
text_en: so let me be kind and tell u: it's going to be ok.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1099
text_en: Right... kind. You're right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1100
text_en: I don't need this... that's not what I meant.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1101
text_en: Listen, sorry. Let me think about this. You are strong Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1102
text_en: ... i don't think i can do this anymore. we're thru. i'm sorry

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1103
text_en: please, please help me understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1104
text_en: It's simple. Kindness can be used to manipulate someone. It can be a weakness. And? Well...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1105
text_en: I don't think I can help you understand. Doesn't change how I feel about you, this is just my life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1106
text_en: i guess ONE conversation won't change anything. just let us, let me, prove kindness is a strength.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo7_1107
text_en: speaking of... someone needs my help. bye

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1108
text_en: I respect that [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1109
text_en: Bye [End].

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1788
text_en: tell ya what, i'll work on this lesson plan for ya!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo7_1110
text_en: And that makes you Aoi. My Aoi. My strong kind Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1789
text_en: and i'll find away to do it that doesn't make you remember anything scary.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1111
text_en: knock knock! it's meee!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1112
text_en: Hey, you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1113
text_en: Come on in, my love!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1114
text_en: Sorry, no one's home right now [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1115
text_en: here i was singin' along to my fav tune, lyrics always have a way of making me bounce a bit.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1116
text_en: and i wondered, wouldn't it be fun to write our own lyrics?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1117
text_en: I'm not much of a writer, but I can try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1118
text_en: I'd be happier if you did it and sang to me, I'm not much for words.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1119
text_en: Hmm, I wish I could, not now [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1120
text_en: oh come onnn, just try? for fun? stretch out some new muscles!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1121
text_en: Okay, fineee, together it is, let's write some lyrics.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1122
text_en: I'd really rather not, but I'd love to watch what you come up with.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1123
text_en: ALLLrighty! Yeah! ok, you pick the genre then, what kind of song will be our first song?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1124
text_en: yes. ok. okay! of course yes. let's get cracking, AOI'S first song lyrics. hm. what genre?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1125
text_en: Me? I love Pop. Let's get some dance-worthy lyrics written.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1126
text_en: Hmm, if there's no kick drum, it's not for me. Let's brood something fierce. Rage anthem!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1127
text_en: There's a type of song from where I'm from, a Space Sea Shanty... let's try that!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1128
text_en: Pop! You're favourite, write what you know, girl!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1129
text_en: Let's break stuff, write a rage anthem Aoi. I know you have it in you!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1130
text_en: mhmm mhmm let's break somethin' then! kick it off!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1131
text_en: SPACE...SEA...SHANTY. mayybeee we shuld call Amir? seems very up his alley.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1132
text_en: aww yes aww, but... hmm. what if i wanted to do the rage anthem actually? you intrigued me a lil bit!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1133
text_en: ok let's see where this goes LOL! this sound fun

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1134
text_en: Her head. In the clouds. That's what I heard them say!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1135
text_en: But the clouds, she knew, was where she wanted to stay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1136
text_en: Because clouds - don't judge, and they protect the world below.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1137
text_en: And clouds, make rain, that makes the flowers growwww!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1138
text_en: So WHAT'S so wrong, with having a head in the clouds? It means someone's watching outtttt

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1139
text_en: And WHAT'S SO WRONG with thinking above the world below, i wanna scream it with my mouthhh!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1140
text_en: Aoi, that felt like you!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1141
text_en: The real Aoi, true to herself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1142
text_en: oh jeeze eek, blush blush! i think i went a little too far...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo8_1143
text_en: i should probably go blow off some steam, i'll grab a bounty. xoxoxox

text_en: orr maybe not. ok. you go first then.

okkk okk my turn:

We weather, we steer, a path that no one knows!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo8_1151
text_en: Lost at sea - lost with the stars. We bow to the wind, we bow!

text_en:
ok wow ur good. hows..

But we never say 'no more'. We always say... Dust. Wind. a new wind blows!

The Void Touch - it knows what makes metal bend!

text_en: Look, this whole manic pixie dream girl  act is cute and all, but I don't need it in my life.

text_en: If we're meeting in 1999, it's the past to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1239

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1793
