text_en: that's probably for the best

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1243
text_en: Yeah, we'll drive ourselves crazy trying to make sense of time travel.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1244
text_en: Let's just say going to the past is in my future.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1245
text_en: We can just focus on our cafe date instead.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1246
text_en: just like a certain doktor I know ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1247
text_en: sounds good to me! ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1248
text_en: date, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1249
text_en: It's best if we just focus on our cafe date.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1250
text_en: Hah. Okay, sassy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1251
text_en: Right? What a psycho.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1252
text_en: date, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1253
text_en: ... tell me u aren't about to stand up for the doktor of my comic book nightmares

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1254
text_en: He has his moments.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1255
text_en: No, he's actually awful.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1256
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_STARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1257
text_en: phew!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1258
text_en: That's right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1259
text_en: As friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1260
text_en: If that's okay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1261
text_en: If that's okay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1262
text_en: As friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1263
text_en: That's right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1264
text_en: I like it ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1265
text_en: cute ^_^ friend date!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1271
text_en: of course it's okay ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1266
text_en: past, present, future. whenever that trendy cafe finds us, our date there will be awesome <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1267
text_en: I like it ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1268
text_en: past, present, future. whenever that trendy cafe finds us, our date there will be awesome <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1269
text_en: cute ^_^ friend date!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1270
text_en: of course it's okay ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1794
text_en: F! See me after class.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1272
text_en: u'd think i'd be better at spotting sarcasm

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1273
text_en: I'll just look forward to our cafe date

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1795
text_en: hahaha oml i should never be a teacher. but lets talk about piano again some day, ok?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1274
text_en: Same here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1275
text_en: Date?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1276
text_en: It's not a date.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo1_1277
text_en: As friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1278
text_en: Sure, why not? ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1279
text_en: ^_^ it's a friend date!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1280
text_en: cute ^_^ friend date!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo1_1281
text_en: past, present, future. whenever that trendy cafe finds us, our date there will be awesome <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1282
text_en: So, how did you end up in Höllvania?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1283
text_en: How did you meet the Hex anyway?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1284
text_en: it doesn't matter

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1285
text_en: You know, I can tell when you're upset.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1286
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1287
text_en: of course u can. we manic pixie dream girls wear our hearts on her sleeves

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1288
text_en: Okay, I admit that calling your interest in me a "manic pixie dream girl act" was inconsiderate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1289
text_en: When I said that manic pixie thing, I only meant you don't have to put on an act for me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1290
text_en: at least u found it "cute and all"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1291
text_en: Well, it was. You're cute. I mean unbelievably cute. I just find it hard to believe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1292
text_en: You caught that, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1293
text_en: how am I supposed to receive that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1294
text_en: I can see a deeper side to you, Aoi. You're tough. You're more than pop songs and emoticons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1295
text_en: Nobody's actually bubbly and fun all the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_2140
text_en: wut makes u think its an act?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1796
text_en: oh - shoot. gotta run, we'll pick up the lesson another time!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1296
text_en: nobody's serious and boring all the time either

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1297
text_en: it concerns me that u don't think depth, toughness, pop songs, and emoticons can go together

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1298
text_en: Listen, I think you're amazing. I said that manic pixie crap because I doubt myself, not you. I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1299
text_en: I'd like it if you received it as me thinking you're awesome.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1300
text_en: I just don't buy that making people happy is your whole reason for being. There's gotta be more to you than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1301
text_en: at least nobody I want to be around

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1302
text_en: that might be true for u, but that doesn't mean it's true for everyone

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1303
text_en: Okay, fair point. You're right. What I said was more about me than you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1304
text_en: I get that u have bad days. who doesn't, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1305
text_en: but u can't just take it out on me cuz I seem "cute" enough to put up with it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1306
text_en: maybe u just haven't been paying attention

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1307
text_en: ur introspection is awfully charming, I admit

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1308
text_en: I get that u have bad days. who doesn't, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1309
text_en: but u can't just take it out on me cuz I seem nice enough to put up with it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1310
text_en: You're right. You deserve better. I'll earn back your faith in me. That's a promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1311
text_en: So you want me to just hide it from you when I've had a bad day?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1312
text_en: u know that's not what I mean

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1313
text_en: It's just an offer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1314
text_en: Okay it was a bad joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1315
text_en: I do like the sound of that promise...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1316
text_en: ok let's put this behind us

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1317
text_en: It's a deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1318
text_en: Agreed. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1319
text_en: If that's what you'd like, it's what I'd like.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1320
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1321
text_en: ttyl

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1322
text_en: (in case you don't know, ttyl means "talk to you later")

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1323
text_en: are u serious right now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1324
text_en: hmm

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1325
text_en: Okay maybe I'm being a little... avoidant.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1326
text_en: No, it was a joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1327
text_en: right...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1328
text_en: look I'm gonna put this behind us, ok?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1329
text_en: I just need some time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1330
text_en: that cheery tale begins with the International Crisis Response (ICR) unit I served on with Arthur

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1331
text_en: nations united in an endless fight for peace! they sent us to Höllvania

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1332
text_en: So you've know Arthur... a while. Did you guys ever...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1333
text_en: "Fight" and "peace" always look funny when paired in a sentence

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1334
text_en: the irony's not lost on me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1335
text_en: hook up?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1336
text_en: I was going to put it more delicately but yes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1337
text_en: You took the words right out of my mouth.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1338
text_en: next question ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1339
text_en: Don't leave me hanging like that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1340
text_en: Okay, okay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1341
text_en: hey, I didn't ask you to bring it up

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1342
text_en: ok

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1343
text_en: The suspense is killing me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1344
text_en: Alright, I won't pressure you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1345
text_en: then I'll see u on the other side

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1346
text_en: how noble of u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1347
text_en: So, why did you join the ICR?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1348
text_en: Was it your choice to join the ICR?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1349
text_en: hmm

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1350
text_en: oh definitely

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1351
text_en: u ever have someone try to get all philosophical on u, saying something like...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1352
text_en: "we all THINK we'd stand up for what's right, but u never know til ur actually in that moment of truth. u might just freeze up! the intensity could totally overwhelm u!!"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1353
text_en: Well, no. With the Orokin, it was always more like, "You WILL fight under pain of death!"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1354
text_en: Oh yes. I know exactly the type.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1356
text_en: right? don’t u just hate that kinda posturing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1357
text_en: We're in complete agreement about that. Good thing it's in the past.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1358
text_en: No, it's okay! I'm okay. I didn't mean to derail you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1359
text_en: It seemed normal at the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1360
text_en: nobody should be *made* to fight

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1361
text_en: that's really sad though

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1362
text_en: I'm sorry that was ur experience

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1363
text_en: Thanks for your sympathy. Really. I'm more interested in you right now though.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1364
text_en: Don't worry about it. I'd just like to know more about that philosophical conundrum of yours.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1365
text_en: well... ok. so... when it came to the question of fighting for what's right...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1366
text_en: whether I'd answer the call or not was never a question for me. honestly, I spent most of high school just trying not to fight—or at least not to argue

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1367
text_en: Why hold back?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1368
text_en: Sounds like you were lots of fun to be around.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1369
text_en: ya ya :P even so...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1370
text_en: I always believed in the whole "pick ur battles" thing... not that I would’ve admitted it back then

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1371
text_en: What kind of battles are we talking here?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1372
text_en: Sounds like wisdom beyond your years.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1373
text_en: ehh, don't give me too much credit. I still got fired up too easily.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1374
text_en: anything about the strong picking on the weak got under my skin. that and bad leaders.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1375
text_en: How does Arthur measure up as a leader?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1376
text_en: he's the gold standard. always puts the team first, never blames someone else for a mistake. we'd all trust him with our lives. he's earned that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1377
text_en: I’m guessing you've wanted to deck Quincy a few times.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1378
text_en: LOL hey, Quincy’s not as mean as he pretends to be. he’s always looking out for the underdog, so he’s good in my book.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1379
text_en: You and Lettie must've clicked right away.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1380
text_en: Lettie understood me faster than anyone else ever has. "fast friends" sums it up perfectly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1381
text_en: Something tells me Eleanor appreciates your loyalty to the underdog.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1382
text_en: I think so. when others kept their distance, worried she'd go full-tech-rot, I made sure to spend time with her. couldn't stand the idea of her feeling alone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1383
text_en: Makes sense you and Amir get along so well.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1384
text_en: ^_^ we have a blast! everyone else is serious *all the time* lol. honestly, without him, I'd probably feel pretty isolated

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1385
text_en: So, when the chance to fight for peace with the ICR came along, it must've felt natural.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1386
text_en: I think I would have liked having you as a friend growing up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1387
text_en: Still kind of hard to believe someone as adorable as you ever wanted to fight. ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1388
text_en: that's...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1389
text_en: exactly

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1390
text_en: cuz u have that fire inside too, don't u? I like that about u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1391
text_en: I'm just gonna pretend u never said that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1392
text_en: enlisting in the ICR felt like a way to channel the fire I’ve always had into something meaningful

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1393
text_en: No regrets enlisting with the ICR?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1394
text_en: No way you were this nice and cute back then, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1395
text_en: none. I really believe that someone has to fight to protect the people who call for peace

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1396
text_en: no matter what happens to me, I know I spent my life fighting for that ideal. I'm proud of that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1397
text_en: being cute always bought me time to pick my battles

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1398
text_en: and being nice? well, it’s just the right way to be

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1399
text_en: I’m beginning to see just how exceptional you are. Thank you for letting me in on a deeper level.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1400
text_en: That's not the answer I expected, but I've come to expect the unexpected from you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1401
text_en: It's a compelling story, Aoi. I'll give you that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1402
text_en: only fair, right? since I wanna know u on that deep level too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1403
text_en: u know how I love to exceed expectations ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1404
text_en: and I'll take it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1405
text_en: talk more soon?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1406
text_en: Yeah, I'd like that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1407
text_en: Sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo2_1408
text_en: Alright then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1409
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPYARMSUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1410
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_1411
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1412
text_en: wut makes u think its an act?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1413
text_en: nobody's serious and boring all the time either

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1414
text_en: it concerns me that u don't think depth, toughness, pop songs, and emoticons can go together

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1415
text_en: Listen, I think you're amazing. I said that manic pixie crap because I doubt myself, not you. I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1416
text_en: I'd like it if you received it as me thinking you're awesome.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1417
text_en: I just don't buy that making people happy is your whole reason for being. There's gotta be more to you than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1418
text_en: at least nobody I want to be around

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1419
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1420
text_en: of course u can. we manic pixie dream girls wear our hearts on her sleeves

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1421
text_en: Okay, I admit that calling your interest in me a "manic pixie dream girl act" was inconsiderate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1422
text_en: When I said that manic pixie thing, I only meant you don't have to put on an act for me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1423
text_en: at least u found it "cute and all"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1424
text_en: Well, it was. You're cute. I mean unbelievably cute. I just find it hard to believe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1425
text_en: You caught that, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1426
text_en: how am I supposed to receive that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1427
text_en: I can see a deeper side to you, Aoi. You're tough. You're more than pop songs and emoticons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1428
text_en: Nobody's actually bubbly and fun all the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1429
text_en: You know, I can tell when you're upset.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1430
text_en: look I'm gonna put this behind us, ok?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1431
text_en: I just need some time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1432
text_en: right...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1433
text_en: No, it was a joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1434
text_en: Okay maybe I'm being a little... avoidant.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1435
text_en: hmm

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1436
text_en: are u serious right now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1437
text_en: (in case you don't know, ttyl means "talk to you later")

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1438
text_en: ttyl

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1439
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1440
text_en: If that's what you'd like, it's what I'd like.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1441
text_en: Agreed. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1442
text_en: It's a deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1443
text_en: ok let's put this behind us

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1444
text_en: I do like the sound of that promise...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1445
text_en: Okay it was a bad joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1446
text_en: It's just an offer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1447
text_en: u know that's not what I mean

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1448
text_en: So you want me to just hide it from you when I've had a bad day?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1449
text_en: You're right. You deserve better. I'll earn back your faith in me. That's a promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1450
text_en: but u can't just take it out on me cuz I seem nice enough to put up with it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1451
text_en: I get that u have bad days. who doesn't, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1452
text_en: ur introspection is awfully charming, I admit

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1453
text_en: maybe u just haven't been paying attention

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1454
text_en: but u can't just take it out on me cuz I seem "cute" enough to put up with it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1455
text_en: I get that u have bad days. who doesn't, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1456
text_en: Okay, fair point. You're right. What I said was more about me than you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1457
text_en: that might be true for u, but that doesn't mean it's true for everyone

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1458
text_en: What's your favourite emoticon?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1459
text_en: Favorite emoticon. Go!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1460
text_en: not in the mood

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1461
text_en: wait, u taught Arthur how emoticons work?? THANK U

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1462
text_en: What's your favourite emoticon?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1463
text_en: Favorite emoticon. Go!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1464
text_en: Yep, sat him down and explained the whole thing. He was so confused at first.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1465
text_en: Just doing my part to keep the team literate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1466
text_en: gosh I am so grateful! now he won’t think I'm challenging him to a duel every time I use “;)”

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1467
text_en: Haha please tell me that didn't really happen.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1468
text_en: Oh Arthur... I guess nobody's perfect.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1469
text_en: oh it REALLY happened

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1470
text_en: nobody but u ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1471
text_en: I can't believe he actually apologized! all thx to u <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1472
text_en: Ah, it was nothing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1473
text_en: I live to serve, my lady.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1474
text_en: It was the least I could do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1475
text_en: u srsly might have just saved us from a lifetime of confusion

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1476
text_en: Glad I could help. So, of all the emoticons you've memorized, which is your favorite?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1477
text_en: Hey, Arthur was missing out. Your emoticons are fun. Which is your favorite?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1478
text_en: guess ^_^

text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_STARE>

text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1483
text_en: no, but thank u! <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1484
text_en: good guess! I use that one a lot because it's so darn versatile, but it's not my fave

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1485
text_en: lol no guess again!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1486
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SUNGLASSES>

text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1489
text_en: oooo not quite but that one's up there!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1490
text_en: u get one more guess, but only cuz ur so cool

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1491
text_en: I give up

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1492
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1493
text_en: ding ding ding! we have a winner! how did u know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1494
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

text_en: Ooooh I can see why that would be your favorite.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1496
text_en: It makes you happy that I've given up?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1497
text_en: I knew it was that one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1498
text_en: it's perfect, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1499
text_en: LOL I never should have doubted u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1500
text_en: no

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1501
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_ANNOYED2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1502
text_en: I was revealing my fave emoticon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1503
text_en: It's my favorite too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1504
text_en: It's just the right mix of cute and witty.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1505
text_en: Just a hunch.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1506
text_en: I've been paying attention.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1507
text_en: a kindred spirit!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1508
text_en: what a lovely observation!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1509
text_en: how mysterious

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1510
text_en: so observant <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1511
text_en: Well, now I know something you love, and I'll never forget it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo3_1512
text_en: Another Aoi mystery solved.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1797
text_en: i read in an On-lyne interview once that music can be like, therapy. maybe it's something we can both enjoy?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1513
text_en: whatever I did to deserve u in my life, I hope no time-travelling mischief-maker ever goes back and changes it <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo3_1514
text_en: yet there's always more to uncover ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1798
text_en: I don't think I'm ready for this, but don't stop on my account.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1799
text_en: I'd really love that. I know music can let people feel.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1800
text_en: Not sure I'll feel much but I'm happy to help you, Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1801
text_en: oh, i see. i know, i do. ok. no sweat, never a prob, let's just listen to a song or two later?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1516
text_en: You know, I’ve been wondering... with your metal-bending skills, why didn’t you ever scrap the arcade for parts? It could’ve been a goldmine for Quincy’s ammo or spare supplies.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1517
text_en: You know, that arcade would make good scrap metal. Could probably build a whole tank out of it. A few atomicycles too. You should re-purpose it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1518
text_en: You know, I’ve been wondering... with your metal-bending skills, why didn’t you ever scrap the arcade for parts? It could’ve been a goldmine for Quincy’s ammo or spare supplies.

text_en: You caught that, huh?

text_en: ttyl

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1547
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1548
text_en: If that's what you'd like, it's what I'd like.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1549
text_en: Agreed. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1550
text_en: It's a deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1551
text_en: ok let's put this behind us

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1552
text_en: I do like the sound of that promise...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1553
text_en: Okay it was a bad joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1554
text_en: It's just an offer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1555
text_en: u know that's not what I mean

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1556
text_en: So you want me to just hide it from you when I've had a bad day?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1557
text_en: You're right. You deserve better. I'll earn back your faith in me. That's a promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1558
text_en: but u can't just take it out on me cuz I seem nice enough to put up with it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1559
text_en: I get that u have bad days. who doesn't, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1560
text_en: ur introspection is awfully charming, I admit

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1561
text_en: maybe u just haven't been paying attention

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1562
text_en: but u can't just take it out on me cuz I seem "cute" enough to put up with it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1563
text_en: I get that u have bad days. who doesn't, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1564
text_en: Okay, fair point. You're right. What I said was more about me than you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1565
text_en: that might be true for u, but that doesn't mean it's true for everyone

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1566
text_en: ur not seriously trying to tell me how to use my powers, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1567
text_en: oh, I thought about it. a few times, actually. but when it comes to leading people into battle, there’s only one thing more important than good gear: good morale

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1568
text_en: Morale?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1569
text_en: Interesting. I suppose I can see that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1570
text_en: We'll have to agree to disagree on that one.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1571
text_en: u telling me u'd let Amir be miserable as long as it meant u could make urself a shiny new atomicycle?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1572
text_en: If it gave the Hex an advantage, yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1573
text_en: You're putting words into my mouth.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1574
text_en: Okay, maybe I'm missing something here.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1802
text_en: yesss! music is the soundtrack to our lives.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1575
text_en: clearly we disagree about what's advantageous

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1576
text_en: so make ur case

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1577
text_en: I was just making a suggestion. You can take it or leave it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1578
text_en: I'm pretty sure Amir would understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1579
text_en: I'm gonna leave it :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1580
text_en: I'm sure he would, but that's not all there is to it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1581
text_en: scrapping the arcade would crush Amir. it’s not just games to him, u know? it’s a reminder of normalcy, something that keeps him smiling.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1582
text_en: that happiness fuels the whole team in ways metal parts never could

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1583
text_en: I guess I never thought about it like that. You're right though. His joy is pretty infectious.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1584
text_en: The way I see it, being that sentimental could get you and the Hex killed.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1585
text_en: sometimes that joy is all that keeps us going

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1586
text_en: then I sure am glad Arthur's the one calling the shots here and not u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1587
text_en: I should have known you would have thought about this so carefully.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1588
text_en: I hope the Hex know how lucky they are to have you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1589
text_en: Well, your bleeding heart might be the death of you, but it's definitely endearing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1590
text_en: hey, we're on the same team ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1591
text_en: we're all lucky to have each other

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1592
text_en: someone without a heart will fall long before someone with a bleeding one

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1593
text_en: (that includes u <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1594
text_en: Point taken.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1595
text_en: I feel like I hit a nerve?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1596
text_en: but hey, I know u care - I mean really care - and that counts for a lot too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1597
text_en: ya I care about Amir's happiness. like a lot.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1598
text_en: that goes for everyone in the Hex

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1599
text_en: I just want the Hex to be as strong as they can be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1600
text_en: Look, I'm glad Amir's happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1601
text_en: well, we have that in common

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1602
text_en: I suppose we do. Maybe there’s more than one way to build strength.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1603
text_en: good cuz if u go after that arcade I'll make every machine in there chase u away!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1604
text_en: it's like the coolest room in the mall!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1605
text_en: plus, how would u have any hope of beating Amir's high score in Ollie’s Crash Course if the arcade were gone? :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1606
text_en: You caught me. That's what this is really about. I'm a sore loser :P I must see that game crushed for besting me!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1607
text_en: Haha you make a good point.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1608
text_en: I gave up on that dream long ago.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1609
text_en: LOL save that rage for the Scaldra ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1610
text_en: don't worry we all did lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1611
text_en: I've gotta run. Promise not to crush any arcade machines while I'm gone?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1612
text_en: Promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1613
text_en: No promises.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo4_1614
text_en: I wouldn't dream of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1615
text_en: excellent!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1616
text_en: I've got my eye on uuuuuu

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo4_1617
text_en: ur the best

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1803
text_en: ok, holdin u to it. in meantime, remember: 88 keys on a piano, they make different sounds!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1618
text_en: nobody's serious and boring all the time either

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1619
text_en: wut makes u think its an act?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1620
text_en: mhm

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1621
text_en: that might be true for u, but that doesn't mean it's true for everyone

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1622
text_en: Okay, fair point. You're right. What I said was more about me than you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1623
text_en: I get that u have bad days. who doesn't, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1624
text_en: but u can't just take it out on me cuz I seem "cute" enough to put up with it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1625
text_en: maybe u just haven't been paying attention

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1626
text_en: ur introspection is awfully charming, I admit

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1627
text_en: I get that u have bad days. who doesn't, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1628
text_en: but u can't just take it out on me cuz I seem nice enough to put up with it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1629
text_en: You're right. You deserve better. I'll earn back your faith in me. That's a promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1630
text_en: So you want me to just hide it from you when I've had a bad day?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1631
text_en: u know that's not what I mean

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1632
text_en: It's just an offer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1633
text_en: Okay it was a bad joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1634
text_en: I do like the sound of that promise...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1635
text_en: ok let's put this behind us

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1636
text_en: It's a deal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1637
text_en: Agreed. :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1638
text_en: If that's what you'd like, it's what I'd like.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1639
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1640
text_en: ttyl

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1641
text_en: (in case you don't know, ttyl means "talk to you later")

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1642
text_en: are u serious right now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1643
text_en: hmm

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1644
text_en: Okay maybe I'm being a little... avoidant.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1645
text_en: No, it was a joke.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1646
text_en: right...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1647
text_en: I just need some time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1648
text_en: look I'm gonna put this behind us, ok?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1649
text_en: You know, I can tell when you're upset.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1650
text_en: Nobody's actually bubbly and fun all the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1651
text_en: I can see a deeper side to you, Aoi. You're tough. You're more than pop songs and emoticons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1652
text_en: how am I supposed to receive that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1653
text_en: You caught that, huh?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1654
text_en: Well, it was. You're cute. I mean unbelievably cute. I just find it hard to believe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1655
text_en: at least u found it "cute and all"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1656
text_en: When I said that manic pixie thing, I only meant you don't have to put on an act for me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1657
text_en: Okay, I admit that calling your interest in me a "manic pixie dream girl act" was inconsiderate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1658
text_en: of course u can. we manic pixie dream girls wear our hearts on her sleeves

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1659
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1660
text_en: at least nobody I want to be around

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1661
text_en: I just don't buy that making people happy is your whole reason for being. There's gotta be more to you than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1662
text_en: I'd like it if you received it as me thinking you're awesome.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1663
text_en: Listen, I think you're amazing. I said that manic pixie crap because I doubt myself, not you. I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1664
text_en: it concerns me that u don't think depth, toughness, pop songs, and emoticons can go together

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1665
text_en: You must be from a really nice country.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1666
text_en: I'm guessing you're not from Höllvania.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1667
text_en: wut gave it away? my zest for life? ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1668
text_en: I grew up in one of Canata's major cities right on the water, surrounded by mountains. it's beautiful! (albeit expensive)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1669
text_en: Do you miss it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1670
text_en: So, I gather you prefer it over Höllvania.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1671
text_en: (Sounds like it's worth the expense.)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1672
text_en: terribly

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1673
text_en: definitely! it's one of my fave places on earth

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1674
text_en: (without a doubt)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1675
text_en: but of course it took embarking on a hero's journey to realize that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1676
text_en: Hero's journey?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1677
text_en: Hero... like in a storybook?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1678
text_en: ya! just like a storybook. gotta leave ur peaceful little village and slay a big dragon so u can truly appreciate the peace, y'know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1679
text_en: Haha I don't know much about dragons, but I know a lot about Orowyrms.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1680
text_en: What if the dragon attacks the village? I've seen plenty of that with Orowyrms.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1681
text_en: Oro-whats? :O

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1682
text_en: That certainly sounds like a dragon!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1683
text_en: They're an Orokin invention... sort of. Big, golden, flying serpentine beasts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1684
text_en: They're the monsters heroes slayed in the storybooks I read growing up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1685
text_en: In that case, you could say I've seen more than my fair share of dragons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1686
text_en: Would you believe I've slain a whole lot of them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1687
text_en: it wouldn't be the craziest thing I've heard a time-traveller say ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1688
text_en: hmmm

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1689
text_en: so u've already had a heroes journey. here I was thinking u were on that journey with us in the Hex.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1690
text_en: Well, Höllvania is the furthest from home I've ever been, so maybe you're right.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1691
text_en: I feel more like a hero with you and the rest of the Hex by my side, so maybe that's true.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1692
text_en: You thought wrong. I've slain more than enough dragons already.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1693
text_en: so I gather!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1694
text_en: we're glad u crossed our path, traveller ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1695
text_en: ur MY hero! ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1696
text_en: hang on. I couldn't tell how serious u were being. have u... literally slain a dragon?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1697
text_en: Yes, literally. Lol. Did they teach you about conceptual embodiment in school?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1698
text_en: No, not literally. I just understand the metaphor. I've lost count of how many dragons have crossed my path since I left home on the Zariman.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1699
text_en: like the man in the wall

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1700
text_en: I've never heard that term in my life :O

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1701
text_en: right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1702
text_en: I paid zero attention in school, but that term came up a few times. Something about imaginary stuff not being imaginary anymore?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1703
text_en: With sufficient emotional intensity, the Void has the power to turn our thoughts into physical beings.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1704
text_en: I'm so confused lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1705
text_en: real dragons?! :O what happened with this "Orowyrm"?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1706
text_en: Yeah. Talk about a dragon attacking a peaceful village.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1707
text_en: Now that's a dragon I'd like to slay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1708
text_en: we'll get him

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1709
text_en: I am too. I was kinda hoping you'd know what it was so you could explain it to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1710
text_en: The point is I've actually encountered an Orowyrm, yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1711
text_en: Oh, there was more than one. And I slayed them. For real.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1712
text_en: They basically went around destroying stuff.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1713
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_CHEEKY>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1714
text_en: huh. maybe fairy tales should remain fiction after all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1715
text_en: sounds like it involves giving form to... a concept.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1716
text_en: oh. my. stars.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1717
text_en: I KNOW AN ACTUAL DRAGON SLAYER

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1718
text_en: sry that's all I got

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1719
text_en: Yes, they definitely should.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1720
text_en: You just need to know how to handle them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1721
text_en: Are you kidding? Watching villages burn was awesome.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1722
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HORRIFIED>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1723
text_en: wait are U a dragon?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1724
text_en: I think that captures it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1725
text_en: Nah, it sounds silly when you put it that way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1726
text_en: maybe one of us should have paid attention in school ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1727
text_en: Hey, it's never too late to start learning

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1728
text_en: Ugh. You sound like my teachers.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1729
text_en: ur teachers were right :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1730
text_en: You caught me!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1731
text_en: No, you are.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1732
text_en: Don't be ridiculous.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1733
text_en: oh no! I really should slay u, but I like u too darn much

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1734
text_en: oh! that explains my fiery personality ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_3103
text_en: sounds like something a dragon would say

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1735
text_en: hey, u think I'd make a good damsel in distress?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1736
text_en: Definitely, and you could count on me to save you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1737
text_en: No way. You're way too capable of saving yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1738
text_en: I think u'd make a good damsel in distress too ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1739
text_en: Thanks! Would you save me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1740
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1741
text_en: Uh...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1742
text_en: we could both be knights instead!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1743
text_en: Let's both be dragons instead.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1744
text_en: Okay, I like the sound of this fairy tale already.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1745
text_en: We'd be the bravest knights in the realm.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1746
text_en: Nah, let's both be damsels.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1747
text_en: of course! <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1748
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY2>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1749
text_en: ditto

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1750
text_en: even better!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1751
text_en: u know it!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1752
text_en: lol whatever suits ur fancy!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1753
text_en: well, brave hero, we'll have to finish this story later. I've gotta get back to the other adventurers in our troop

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1754
text_en: Say hi to everyone for me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo5_1755
text_en: I look forward to the next chapter.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1756
text_en: will do!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo5_1757
text_en: there's so very much to look forward to <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo6_1758
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_MUSIC2> question for u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank3Convo6_1759
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_CHEEKY> Answer 4 U

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1805
text_en: Look who's online. Anything you want to talk about?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1806
text_en: So. What's on Aoi's mind today?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1807
text_en: how kind of u to ask! I'd love to know more about Duviri, if ur willing to share

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1808
text_en: how kind of u to ask! i was wondering about Duviri, if ur willing to share

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1809
text_en: how kind of u to ask! I'd love to know more about Lotus, if ur willing to share

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1810
text_en: Heh. Right, well, you remember those literal dragons I told you about? That's where they were.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1811
text_en: You'll get a kick out of this. Duviri has flying dragons, called Orowyrms.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1812
text_en: Duviri can be beautiful but it's... also dangerous, like all storybook worlds. Filled with monsters and lessons to learn.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1813
text_en: i really want to see them they sound SO COOL

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1814
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WHOA>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1815
text_en: oh yeah? like what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1816
text_en: dragons?! like literal dragons?!?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1817
text_en: We have an evil child king, named Dominus Thrax.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1818
text_en: We have a full court of characters, each plagued by their own horrible backstories. Each one represents an emotion.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1821
text_en: Eh... He's just really lonely.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1822
text_en: Yes. Trust me. Yes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1823
text_en: He can't help the way the Void made him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1819
text_en: aww... is he really evil tho?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1820
text_en: sounds... dramatic

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1824
text_en: then we should go and fight him together! u n me! how fun does that sound?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1825
text_en: now i feel bad for him

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1826
text_en: i wanna go see a dragon!! that sounds SO COOL

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1827
text_en: You know how I can use Transference to steer you around? I can use Transference on an Orowyrm, too. That is *really* weird.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1828
text_en: They can be, when they're not trying to kill you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1829
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WHOA>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1830
text_en: what's it like to be a dragon?!?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1831
text_en: but they sound like they'd be fun to fight, though

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1832
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1953
text_en: Later, Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1833
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1834
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_OHNO>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1835
text_en: he just needs friends... and family... like we all do

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1845
text_en: To put it lightly. But they're the closest thing I ever really had to family that I can really remember...?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1846
text_en: Eh. It's all a metaphor for learning to accept and moderate your emotions without blocking any of them out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1847
text_en: How sad is that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1848
text_en: The Void just happened to reach into my head and make it real. And... deadly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1849
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_OHNO>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1850
text_en: i don't think i like the Void very much

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1851
text_en: ... maybe I don't want to go to Duviri after all...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1852
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_AWHUG>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1853
text_en: it's not sad. u've done the best u can

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1854
text_en: That's for the best.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1855
text_en: I think you'd honestly enjoy it - running around, slaying monsters, saving the townsfolk. It's all very Noble.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1856
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1857
text_en: now that u put it that way, let's go! u n me, against Duviri!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1836
text_en: u and me, dragon slayers! charging off to victory!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1837
text_en: The turning radius is shockingly *terrible.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1838
text_en: Strange, at first. But getting to fly? That's so much fun.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1839
text_en: LOL!!!! i'll stick to my atomicycle then <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1840
text_en: I just wish it lasted. And that it wasn't trying to actively *kill me.*

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1841
text_en: but they sound like they'd be fun to fight, though

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1842
text_en: I think with you by my side, nothing could stop us. Not an Orowyrm. Not the Indifference. Nothing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1843
text_en: When you've got family beside you, watching your back? Nobody stands a chance.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1844
text_en: Easy, there. They're huge. And dangerous.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1858
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1859
text_en: u got that right

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1860
text_en: ur no fun at all

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1861
text_en: Sure. I mean... I don't know her very well? The kid knows her better than I do. But she saved my life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1862
text_en: I owed her for saving my life. So when she needed me to come here, I answered the call.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1863
text_en: the kid? what kid?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1864
text_en: oh? how did she save u?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1865
text_en: A version of me from this timeline that didn't age because they were stuck in a stasis pod on Lua, which the Lotus, who later saved me, put Lua and the kid into the Void for a while, to keep everybody safe--

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1866
text_en: Right. Yeah. So. Technically, I'm from an alternate timeline. The other version of me didn't age as much, because... y'know? It's a long story.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1867
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HORRIFIED>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1868
text_en: stopstopstopstop

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1870
text_en: how do u keep that all straight?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank6Convo1_3101
text_en: turns out all i ever really needed in my life was someone who saw ME for ME. someone who had my back. someone who was there for me and smiled when i smiled

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1872
text_en: Amir's making a whole website to try to keep it straight. Lol.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1873
text_en: It's... complicated, yeah.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1874
text_en: You get used to it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1875
text_en: C'mon dummy, catch up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1876
text_en: i hope so! lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1877
text_en: no kidding lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1878
text_en: lol!! sounds like something he'd do

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1879
text_en: and it sounds useful, too. i might need it x_x

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1880
text_en: Are you kidding me? *I* might need it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1881
text_en: You do get used to it eventually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1882
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TWOHUGS>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1883
text_en: soooooo the lotus? she saved u? how?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1884
text_en: When I was in Duviri, I was... trapped. In apathy. I'd forgotten who I was. Why I was there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1885
text_en: Sometimes, when you're stuck at the bottom of your life... you just need a helping hand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1886
text_en: And she was one of the two people who helped pull me out of there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1887
text_en: And she gave me one. Literally.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1888
text_en: The Lotus and Teshin, my mentor, are the reason why I had the ability and the bravery to escape that place.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1889
text_en: Without their support? I'd probably still be there. Endlessly looping. Endlessly dying. Indifferent to it all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_1890
text_en: They gave me what I needed to achieve victory. Victory over myself. And hopefully, soon... the Indifference.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1891
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1892
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1893
text_en: when u have people in ur corner, nothing can stop u! n now u got me and the hex backing u up!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_1894
text_en: sounds like nobody can stop u! n now u got me and the hex backing u up!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1895
text_en: would u believe I just listened to an album that dropped the line "chicks actin dumb" in four different songs?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1896
text_en: straight to the trash it goooes!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1897
text_en: Yeesh. Say what you will about the Orokin, but you can't deny they wrote more eloquent lyrics than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1898
text_en: Sounds incredibly lame.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1899
text_en: Besides those lyrics, was the rest of the album okay?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1900
text_en: meaning aside, using the same line that many times is TOTALLY unoriginal

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1901
text_en: ... but I admit my personal experience might be clouding my judgement. other parts of the album were fine.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1902
text_en: should I fish it out of the trash for u so u can give it an unbiased listen? ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1903
text_en: Back up. Personal experience? Who's ever called you a "chick acting dumb?"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1904
text_en: Hah. No thanks. I hope the next album you listen to is more enjoyable. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1905
text_en: I'll pass, but I'd love to hear what personal experience you're referring to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1907
text_en: u and me both! ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1906
text_en: oooh I've heard it aaall

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1908
text_en: What? No I haven't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1909
text_en: Oh right... I'm sorry.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1910
text_en: What an asshole.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1911
text_en: Would it have killed him to mind his own business?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1912
text_en: He was just jealous that you knew how to have fun.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1913
text_en: even u've called called me "dumb" before

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1914
text_en: even when I served with distinction in the ICR. Officer Barnier saw me bopping to a song in my head one time and said, "We need to do something about that one. She's ditzy."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1915
text_en:
me: "pinky swear"
u: "no"
me: "swear on something important to u"
u: "no this is dumb"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1916
text_en: well, it said more about him than me. he showed me nice and early that he wasn't worth my time

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1917
text_en: apology accepted <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1918
text_en: Oh. Right. I think I remember that. Sorry, that was rude.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1919
text_en: Ah I remember now. Well, it was dumb, but it was also cute. Sorry I upset you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1920
