text_en: It's coming back to me now. In my defense, I meant the pinky swear stuff, not you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1921
text_en: I pinky swear to swear on stuff that's important to me in the future. Lol.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1922
text_en: Glad to hear it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1923
text_en: Cool <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1924
text_en: a blessing in disguise ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1926
text_en: Yeah, a guy like that isn't worth anybody's time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1927
text_en: His loss.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_3106
text_en: If you say so.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_3107
text_en: No, it is. I shouldn't have said that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1925
text_en: it's no big deal

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1928
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SMITTEN>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1929
text_en: I'm in a charitable mood ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1930
text_en: I'll hold u to that! but don't sweat it lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1931
text_en: it didn't wound me too badly anyway

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1932
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SMITTEN>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1933
text_en: enh I wish him well but u've gotta pick ur battles

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1934
text_en: I came to the conclusion a long time ago that it's an advantage to be seen as ditzy

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1935
text_en: I can see that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1936
text_en: You have my attention.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1937
text_en: How so?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1938
text_en: it means I'm being underestimated. I can do anything and nobody will even think to stand in my way

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1939
text_en: To each their own, I guess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1940
text_en: You're really something else, Aoi. I mean that in the best way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1941
text_en: Seems kind of sad.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1942
text_en: lemons to lemonade

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1943
text_en: yes indeed

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1944
text_en: oh I just luv our talks

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1945
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1946
text_en: we all have our own ways of getting by

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1947
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1948
text_en: so do u want me to fish that album out of the trash for u? lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1949
text_en: Thanks, but I'll stick to shawzin music.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1950
text_en: Nah, you're way too cute for... trash fishing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1951
text_en: Keep it in the trash where it belongs.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo2_1954
text_en: Have fun!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo2_1952
text_en: very well! I'm off to clean my brain with Party of Ur Lifetime ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1955
text_en: You've never told me anything about your family.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1956
text_en: You know, we've covered a lot of topics, but your upbringing is still a mystery to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1957
text_en: what would u like to know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1958
text_en: Any siblings?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1959
text_en: Tell me about your parents.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1960
text_en: nope. just lil ol' me. how about u?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1961
text_en: I had a sibling.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1962
text_en: Oh. Not technically? But all us kids on the Zariman were basically raised together.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1964
text_en: past tense... do u mind if I ask what happened?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1965
text_en: was it nice? growing up with all those other kids?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1966
text_en: To be honest, I wished I was an only child most of the time.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1967
text_en: Sometimes. They're not all fond memories. Kids can be mean, you know?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1968
text_en: The best. We really understood each other. I took that for granted.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1969
text_en: I'd rather not get into it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1970
text_en: Same thing that happened to my parents. The Man in the Wall.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1971
text_en: ok. I understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1972
text_en: u've been through so much

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1973
text_en: I'm sorry

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1974
text_en: Did you like being an only child?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1975
text_en: How about your parents? What were they like?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1976
text_en: oh that's too bad

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1977
text_en: it makes me so happy to hear that ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1978
text_en: I do know. nothing can be perfect, I guess

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1979
text_en: I always imagined it would be better to grow up in a house with other kids

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1980
text_en: there was school I guess but that's not the same

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1981
text_en: if mom and dad argue, the kids at school aren't *really* in it with u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1982
text_en: all the more reason to be there for each other

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1983
text_en: It's okay. I'll get my revenge one day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1984
text_en: Sorry, I didn't mean to make this about me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1985
text_en: u will. I really believe that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1986
text_en: Everyone's been through a lot. Not just me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1987
text_en: no please it's okay. I'm just happy that ur willing to let me know u on a deeper level

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1988
text_en: That's kind of you. So, where were we? You were going to tell me about your parents?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1989
text_en: Let's get back to you. Your parents still around?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1990
text_en: aah the Morohoshi household was a happy one indeed

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1991
text_en: I think so. it's been ages since I heard any kind of update but... ya. they'd be back home.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1992
text_en: I can't tell if you're serious.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1993
text_en: Did you get along with them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1994
text_en: That explains why you're so nice.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1995
text_en: oh that's so sweet of u. heh... is it bad that I was exaggerating a little?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_1996
text_en: You happy about that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1997
text_en: I am - sort of. "happy" doesn't really describe mom and dad

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1998
text_en: we got along well enough

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1999
text_en: lol of course I am

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2000
text_en: my parents were...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2001
text_en: Did your parents fight a lot?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2002
text_en: Saves you from fighting with the other kids though. Lol.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2003
text_en: That's true. There was always someone there.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2004
text_en: oh no I didn't mean that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2005
text_en: true. I appreciate that silver lining lol

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2006
text_en: that's truly special

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2007
text_en: What were your parents like?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2008
text_en: Did you get along with your parents?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_1963
text_en: they were great. just kinda distant

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2009
text_en: we didn't always see eye-to-eye

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2010
text_en: I'm sure that's true for most kids.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2011
text_en: About how you should spend your life?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2012
text_en: About music? :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2013
text_en: ur probably right. funny how we can all be so similar yet so different.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2014
text_en: LOL actually yes, but that wasn't a big deal

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2015
text_en: ya. more or less.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2016
text_en: they were so upset when I told them I'd enlisted to be a soldier. didn't make much difference to them that it was for peace keeping

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2017
text_en: I had a very high risk tolerance for my own life. my parents? not so much

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2018
text_en: They should have been proud of you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2019
text_en: They were concerned for their daughter's safety.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2020
text_en: They underestimated you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2021
text_en: definitely. wish I'd been more grateful for that at the time... and more understanding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2022
text_en: I think they were, but they were concerned too. they didn't want anything to hurt their only daughter.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2023
text_en: I wouldn't say that. they just wanted their only daughter to be safe...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2024
text_en: I’m incredibly lucky to have parents who cared as deeply as they did. it’s just a shame our family never found a way to show it openly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2025
text_en: if I get the chance to see them again, I’ll make things right. I'll shower them in love haha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2026
text_en: Good luck with that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2027
text_en: You'll see them again one day. I'm sure of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2028
text_en: Let's hope you get that chance.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2029
text_en: thx... I think?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2030
text_en: I'll do everything in my power to make it so

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2031
text_en: u know, hearing someone else say that makes it feel more true <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2032
text_en: thx for asking about them

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_3108
text_en: it's nice to reminisce anyway

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2033
text_en: it's nice to be asked about mom and dad :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2034
text_en: most of the hex get so bummed out remembering home. we don't talk about family much.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2035
text_en: Except Arthur and Eleanor, of course.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2036
text_en: That's too bad. We should keep those memories alive.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2037
text_en: I can understand why they'd feel that way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2038
text_en: of course <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2039
text_en: ya. me too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2040
text_en: agreed :) but I get where they're coming from

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2041
text_en: well, I'd better get going for now

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2042
text_en: Alright. Take care of yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2043
text_en: it's easy when you make me feel so safe <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2044
text_en: ya :) we're definitely gonna talk again soon, silly

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo3_2045
text_en: u too <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2046
text_en: Thanks for letting me get to know you better.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo3_2047
text_en: For now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2048
text_en: hey, um...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2049
text_en: this might sound corny, but it’s important to me, so I’m just gonna say it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2050
text_en: u make me feel like I belong

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2051
text_en: I don’t know if I can take credit for that. Someone as incredible as you always belongs with good people.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2052
text_en: maybe... in a way

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2053
text_en: Me? But Aoi, everyone in the Hex absolutely adores you. Trust me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2054
text_en: oh, I know they do <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> and I adore them too but...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2055
text_en: The thought that you don't always feel that way honestly breaks my heart.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2056
text_en: oh it's not like I've ever been excluded or anything!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2057
text_en: I mean, I know how to fit in anywhere, but that’s not the same as truly belonging.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2058
text_en: I get that. Being appreciated is one thing. Feeling seen for who you really are is another.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2059
text_en: No, I guess it’s not. Belonging is being seen for who you are and knowing that’s enough.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2060
text_en: Truly belonging is a tall order.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2061
text_en: It sure is. And even so, you make me feel... hmm...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2062
text_en: exactly. and that’s what you give me. even when things are chaotic or scary, with you, I feel… hmm…

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2063
text_en: at home

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2064
text_en: You’ve always felt like home to me too. Maybe I just didn’t know how to say it until now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2065
text_en: You make me feel the same way. No matter what happens, I know I can count on you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2066
text_en: You’re a rare kind of friend, Aoi. One of the best. I’ll always make sure you feel seen.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2068
text_en: I like you, Aoi. More than a friend. A lot, actually.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2069
text_en: I mean, you’re my best friend, Aoi. The one who gets me without me having to try.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2070
text_en: wow. that could be a lyric in an On-lyne song.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2071
text_en: I know you’re from so far away <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2072
text_en: sorry was that super weird to say right now?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2073
text_en: my heart is beating really fast

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2074
text_en: I mean, literal time travel!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2075
text_en: but just so u know, I’ll always do everything I can to be a home for you too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2076
text_en: Don’t apologize. I know you, Aoi. What higher compliment could I get than being compared to an On-lyne song?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2077
text_en: It's okay. Mine too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2078
text_en: Nothing you say is weird. Not to me anyway.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2079
text_en: You’ve shown me that since the day we met.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2080
text_en: Home all the way in 1999? I like the sound of that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2081
text_en: That's insanely sweet of you, Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2082
text_en: okay, well… I know what those songs are usually about

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2083
text_en: heh. at least we understand each other.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2084
text_en: ur one of my favorite people in the whole world, u know that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2085
text_en: that's a relief

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2086
text_en: so...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2087
text_en: Right back at you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2088
text_en: There's no one else quite like you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2089
text_en: Yeah, I know that ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2091
text_en: It means no matter what happens, I'll always have your back. You're the best friend I've ever had.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2092
text_en: It means I think you're amazing and I'd like to go out with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2093
text_en: Well, how do you feel about me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2094
text_en: don't u know? I adore u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2095
text_en: Then I think it means we should make this official.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2096
text_en: seriously ur amazing. everything u’ve faced, everything u’ve become... I’m so grateful to know u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2097
text_en: Knowing you have my back, I feel like I can take on the world.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2098
text_en: And I’m grateful for you. Thanks for always being there, Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2099
text_en: ^_^ always and forever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2100
text_en: now go out and have an awesome day, k?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2101
text_en: [Don't respond.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2102
text_en: Only if you promise to do the same.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2103
text_en: Okay, but only because you asked so nicely.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2104
text_en: deal <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2105
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_TINYSMILE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2106
text_en: I

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2107
text_en: oml I got so nervous and excited that I stopped typing, put my hand over my mouth, and hit send by accident

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2108
text_en: Haha is that a yes?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2109
text_en: You're so cute it's insane.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2110
text_en: So… is that a no?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2111
text_en: of course it is!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2112
text_en: if u could see how much I'm smiling right now it would be obvious!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2113
text_en: what I meant to say was

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2114
text_en: I would love nothing more than that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2115
text_en: no!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2116
text_en: I mean yes!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2117
text_en: I mean, yes, I’d love to go out with u!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2118
text_en: I'm glad you feel the same way I do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2119
text_en: You make me so happy, Aoi. I promise I’ll do everything I can to make you feel the same.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2120
text_en: this is even better than a love song. I mean, seriously, ur one of the most incredible people I’ve ever met

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2121
text_en: everything u’ve been through, everything u are… gosh, I’m so happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2122
text_en: Good.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2123
text_en: Me too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2124
text_en: heh. Lettie just walked in asking why she heard me shriek.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2125
text_en: Oh dear. I hope she didn't think you were injured.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2126
text_en: Haha you’d better go tell her what happened.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2127
text_en: haha no it's fine!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2128
text_en: aah! ok ur right I will

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2129
text_en: I've totally gotta tell her everything tho

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2130
text_en: You two have fun.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2131
text_en: Talk soon, darling.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2132
text_en: You two have fun.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_2133
text_en: Okay. I'll be thinking of you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2134
text_en: she's already excited haha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2135
text_en: I'm always thinking of u ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2136
text_en: she's already excited haha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2137
text_en: I love the sound of "darling"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2138
text_en: wow ur my very own love song

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_2139
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_2141
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HORRIFIED>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank3Convo2_2142
text_en: that's horrible!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2143
text_en: ok I'll tell u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2144
text_en: about me and Arthur

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2145
text_en: Tell me what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2146
text_en: This ought to be good.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_3122
text_en: "good" isn't exaaactly how I'd describe it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2147
text_en: I've decided I should tell u why Arthur and I ended things

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2148
text_en: You don't owe me an explanation. I really mean that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2149
text_en: I can't deny I'm intrigued.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2150
text_en: ur someone I trust, someone I want to know on a deep level. it's only right that I share that same depth with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2151
text_en: in the future, do u still celebrate venusia? it's the holiday around love and acceptance

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2152
text_en: Oh that? I'd totally forgotten. (Kidding I'm really curious)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2153
text_en: (I don't blame u I guess)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2154
text_en: in the future, do u still celebrate venusia? it's the holiday around love and acceptance

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2155
text_en: We do, but we call it Star Days.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2156
text_en: We call it Star Days, and there's someone on Venus who I think would love to know that they built on an old tradition, even if she didn't realize it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2157
text_en: We call it Star Days, and there's someone on Venus who I think would love to know that they built on an old tradition, even if she didn't realize it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2158
text_en: We do, but we call it Star Days.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2159
text_en: it makes me happy to know that people still celebrate something like it in the future ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2160
text_en: I think I'd get along well with that person ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2161
text_en: I think I'd get along well with that person ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2162
text_en: it makes me happy to know that people still celebrate something like it in the future ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2163
text_en: Well, they certainly do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2164
text_en: Yeah, some people are really into it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2165
text_en: One of my favorite holidays

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2166
text_en: She'd adore you. So, what happened between you and Arthur during Venusia?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2167
text_en: Did something bad happen to you during Venusia?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2168
text_en: Well, they certainly do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2169
text_en: Yeah, some people are really into it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2170
text_en: One of my favorite holidays

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2171
text_en: if u managed to pull an explanation out of Arthur - and that's a big IF - he'd probably say our fight on venusia ended the relationship

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2172
text_en: it was a fight during venusia that ultimately ended things between me and Arthur

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2173
text_en: that was the first time he saw me really upset. I think it took him by surprise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2174
text_en: that was the first time he saw me really upset. I think it took him by surprise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2175
text_en: I'd hate to see you really upset.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2176
text_en: I'm sure he deserved it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2177
text_en: I'm sure he deserved it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2178
text_en: I'd hate to see you really upset.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2179
text_en: heh. maybe...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2180
text_en: that's sweet of u <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2181
text_en: we were out on a peacekeeping mission with the ICR but I still wanted to celebrate venusia in some way

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2182
text_en: so I spent weeks folding 1000 paper cranes for him. they're supposed to be good luck, u know? and 1000 are supposed to grant a wish

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2183
text_en: I dunno. it's not really about who "deserved" what. it just came down to us being too different.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2184
text_en: and I u <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2185
text_en: we were out on a peacekeeping mission with the ICR but I still wanted to celebrate venusia in some way

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2186
text_en: so I spent weeks folding 1000 paper cranes for him. they're supposed to be good luck, u know? and 1000 are supposed to grant a wish

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2187
text_en: every spare second I had between meals or before bed, I'd sneak off, all excited about how happy a venusia surprise was gonna make him

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2188
text_en: Wow. That's incredibly thoughtful, and takes so much time and skill. Truly, an act of love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2189
text_en: Arthur was lucky to be with someone who cared so much about making him happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2190
text_en: looking back, it's kind of embarrassing. I had built up his reaction in my head and then when I gave him the cranes...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2191
text_en: he just said, "thanks, but we really dont have time for this kind of thing."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2192
text_en: I don't want to discount your feelings, but I can see where Arthur was coming from. He was focused on the mission.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2193
text_en: Aoi, I'm sorry. I can't imagine how much that hurt you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2194
text_en: ...Wishing I could punch Arthur right now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2195
text_en: I could too, but understanding only gets u so far. when something deep within says something's off, eventually u just have to listen

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2196
text_en: heh... in the moment, I had a similar feeling

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2197
text_en: u know, I think I needed to hear that more than I realized. thx <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2198
text_en: it was like something snapped. all this time I'd spent understanding him... had he really done the same for me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2199
text_en: Wow. That's incredibly thoughtful, and takes so much time and skill. Truly, an act of love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2200

text_en: he just said, "thanks, but we really dont have time for this kind of thing."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2202
text_en: it was like something snapped. all this time I'd spent understanding him... had he really done the same for me?

text_en: I could too, but understanding only gets u so far. when something deep within says something's off, eventually u just have to listen

text_en: ...Wishing I could punch Arthur right now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2205
text_en: heh... in the moment, I had a similar feeling

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2206
text_en: u know, I think I needed to hear that more than I realized. thx <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2207
text_en: Arthur was lucky to be with someone who cared so much about making him happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2208
text_en: Aoi, I'm sorry. I can't imagine how much that hurt you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2209
text_en: every spare second I had between meals or before bed, I'd sneak off, all excited about how happy a venusia surprise was gonna make him

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2210
text_en: I don't want to discount your feelings, but I can see where Arthur was coming from. He was focused on the mission.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2211
text_en: maybe if I'd taken time to understand myself sooner, I would've reacted in a way I'd be proud of...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2212
text_en: Feeling upset is nothing to be ashamed of.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2213
text_en: Whatever happened, I promise it's okay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2214
text_en: I threw the cranes onto the road. didn't take long for a tank to drive over them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2215
text_en: Arthur should have run into the road and picked them up anyway.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2216
text_en: Oh Aoi... all your hard work...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2217
text_en: looking back, destroying those cranes just hurt me more. could have saved that wish for myself ha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2218
text_en: there wouldn't have been much point. they were soaked and torn - ruined

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2219
text_en: oh well. what's done is done.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2220
text_en: So, you ended things right there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2221
text_en: I can imagine the shock on Arthur's face.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2222
text_en: my exact words to Arthur were, "ur right. now that you mention it, we don't have time for this relationship either."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2223
text_en: It's admirable that you're still close friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2224
text_en: I just realized I couldn't ask him to be someone he wasn't. he was never gonna find joy in simple things with me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2225
text_en: I'm sure a lot more than just that one fight led to the breakup.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2226
text_en: maybe if I'd taken time to understand myself sooner, I would've reacted in a way I'd be proud of...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2227
text_en: I'm sure a lot more than just that one fight led to the breakup.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2228
text_en: Uh oh...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2229
text_en: It's admirable that you're still close friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2230
text_en: ya that about sums it up

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2231
text_en: I can imagine the shock on Arthur's face.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2232
text_en: So, you ended things right there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2233
text_en: but that's the truth of how it went down. now u know

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2234
text_en: maybe

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2235
text_en: looking back, destroying those cranes just hurt me more. could have saved that wish for myself ha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2236
text_en: Oh Aoi... all your hard work...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2237
text_en: Okay seems like a bit of an overreaction...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2238
text_en: I threw the cranes onto the road. didn't take long for a tank to drive over them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2239
text_en: Feeling upset is nothing to be ashamed of.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2240
text_en: sure but it's water under the bridge

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2241
text_en: well, of course, we'll always have each other's backs

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2242
text_en: we couldn't even, say... listen to On-lyne together. even if I convinced him to, he wouldn't enjoy it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2243
text_en: it's not like I expect my partner to like everything I like, but I need the chance to share happiness

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2244
text_en: thx for listening

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2245
text_en: Anytime

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2246
text_en: Thank you for opening up to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2247
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2248
text_en: breaking down a broody facade only to constantly brush off eye rolls and good-natured jokes is... exhausting

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2249
text_en: I know Arthur cares about me. we'll always respect each other, but when it comes to love, that's not enough

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2250
text_en: Thank you for opening up to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2251
text_en: You amaze me, Aoi. Someone who truly sees and loves people for who they are deserves a partner who will do the same.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2252
text_en: ur very easy to open up to :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2253
text_en: ur making me blush

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2254
text_en: I really didn't expect to feel this good after sharing that story. there's just something about u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2255
text_en: thx for listening

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2256
text_en: I'm always here if you need me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2257
text_en: Anytime.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2258
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2259
text_en: just want u to know I'm thinking of u ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2260
text_en: That's weird because I never think of you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2261
text_en: Weird I was just thinking about you too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2262
text_en: It makes my day to hear that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2263
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_STARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2264
text_en: ok i'll stop thinking of u now

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2265
text_en: OML do u think we sensed each other's thoughts?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_3109
text_en: there's nothing I like more than brightening ur day!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2266
text_en: Definitely not haha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2267
text_en: Well, if life's taught me one thing it's that the Void makes anything possible.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2268
text_en: Sure, why not?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2269
text_en: ur futuristic insights are always appreciated

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2270
text_en: ^_^ gosh that's cool

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2271
text_en: :) Are you having a good day too?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2272
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPYHAND>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2273
text_en: You're a good person.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2274
text_en: better now that I talked to u!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2275
text_en: oh. bummerrr

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2276
text_en: maybe a *little* but only cuz I want to make u smile

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo5_2277
text_en: *Nothing* you like more? I think you might be exaggerating.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2278
text_en: ah! that's Arthur calling me. when the boss calls, I'd better answer, ya?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2279
text_en: until next time!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2280
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2281
text_en: until next time!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo5_2282
text_en: ah! that's Arthur calling me. when the boss calls, I'd better answer, ya?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2283
text_en: u've told me so many awful stories about the Orokin... was there ever anyone who turned their back on their way of life?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2284
text_en: Believe it or not, Doctor Albrecht Entrati.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2285
text_en: Most of them ended up dead. But Albrecht Entrati did, in his own way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2286
text_en: ew.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2287
text_en: ugh, that guy. always slipping through death's grip.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2288
text_en: and here I was hoping it’d be someone... cooler.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2289
text_en: well, there's u, I guess ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2290
text_en: only to chase after whatever served him best, I’m sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2291
text_en: Yeah um... I'll think of a cool Orokin. Give me a minute.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2292
text_en: Sorry to disappoint. He’s your guy. Refused Kuva, which allows them to be immortal. Didn’t go for the fashionable long arm. None of it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2293
text_en: Did you ever respect Entrati?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2294
text_en: What do you really think of Entrati? Beyond the “uncool” verdict.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2295
text_en: Hah. I'm not an Orokin. I'm just from their empire. Very different.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2296
text_en: hmm. pulling out the big questions now, huh? I guess u’ve earned it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2297
text_en: I have no respect left to lose for the guy ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2298
text_en: ooooh. confusing

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2299
text_en: i really didn't like entrati, though. people like him only pretend to be charming when it serves them

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2300
text_en: people like him only pretend to be charming when it serves them

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2301
text_en: What do you think he's really after?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2302
text_en: So you found him charming at some point.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2303
text_en: control. complete domination.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2304
text_en: i wouldn’t go that far. more like I was open to respecting him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2305
text_en: not in the fun, pop star world-tour way either.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2306
text_en: but he threw that away.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2307
text_en: he devours whatever he touches. not even the whole universe would be enough for him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2308
text_en: And you knew that early on? You’re the most intuitive in the Hex. If anyone would’ve had a gut feeling, it’d be you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2309
text_en: I'm inclined to agree with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2310
text_en: I don't know. There's an awful lot of universe out there. :P

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2311
text_en: thank you. ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2312
text_en: but he'd try and that's the problem

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2313
text_en: not right away, but pretty early, I got this sinking feeling like something bad was about to happen every time he was nice

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2314
text_en: and back then, I didn’t have the words for it, but it always felt like HE would be the one behind whatever went wrong.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2315
text_en: but when he has everyone around u fooled, what can u really do?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2316
text_en: Do you think he actually had everyone fooled?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2317
text_en: I guess you wait for them to see it for themselves.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2318
text_en: well, maybe not

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2319
text_en: ya

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2320
text_en: more like everyone was too scared to challenge him

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2321
text_en: it’s kinda my curse, instinctively playing nice

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2322
text_en: which annoys me to no end.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2323
text_en: maybe if I’d said something, more people would’ve seen through him sooner.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2324
text_en: If it’s any comfort, he’s had the same effect where I’m from too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2325
text_en: You’re not alone there. He left his mark on everyone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2326
text_en: that’s... bittersweet, I guess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2327
text_en: ugh. not even the future is safe from that guy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2328
text_en: He left behind a daughter who’s still trying to fix the pieces he shattered. Angry as she is, I feel like she can't help believing in him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2329
text_en: Yeah. He left behind his lover to mend the damage he did to countless people... and animals.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2330
text_en: that's just him. that's what he does.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2331
text_en: he's the only being of emptiness I've ever known.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2332
text_en: when he finds something he wants, he consumes it completely, then tosses it away when it's spent. always in the most heartless, self-serving way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2333
text_en: Yeah... “uncool” is starting to sound like an understatement.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2334
text_en: LOL I've never met anyone less cool!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2335
text_en: Damn. Hey, don't hold back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2336
text_en: I can't deny that thinking about it gets me pretty worked up...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2337
text_en: give my regards to everyone he hurt in the future.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2338
text_en: I doubt even the people who like him would deny that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2339
text_en: Sorry if I dragged up some dark memories.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2340
text_en: We don't have to talk about him every again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2341
text_en: You know it's serious when Aoi starts using periods and stops using emoticons.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2342
text_en: no, it's ok...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2343
text_en: lol u know me so well it's scary

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2344
text_en: look, when I think of the doktor, I remember the first time I saw fear in Arthur's eyes

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2345
text_en: I think of Amir in total panic, Eleanor unable to speak, Quincy hardening his heart, and Lettie too overwhelmed to save the people around her

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2346
text_en: and I know the doktor would smile hearing that...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2347
text_en: but there are good things too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2348
text_en: After a list like that, it’s hard to imagine what those good things could be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2349
text_en: Would you count your powers among those good things?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2350
text_en: u know what? I think I would.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2351
text_en: I have a collection of metal cranes that might one day grant me a wish

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2352
text_en: and every day, I see small acts of defiance from an old, forgotten mall in Höllvania that remind me the human spirit is unbreakable

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2353
text_en: and of course, I met u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2354
text_en: Hmm. If nothing else, your perspective alone proves the human spirit really can’t be broken.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2355
text_en: You're right. Those are good things.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2356
text_en: That list seems pretty weak compared to Albrecht Entrati, Consumer of Worlds.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2357
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPYHAND>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2358
text_en: as long as there are people who care for each other, people like Entrati will never consume everything

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2359
text_en: Let’s make sure Entrati never wins.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo6_2360
text_en: Well, you can count on me to care.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2361
text_en: deal <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo6_2362
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> I've never doubted u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2363
text_en: so, i think i have it!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2364
text_en: ahem ahem! are u ready for your piano lesson?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2365
text_en: may i introduce u to a friend? 'Mr Piano' is his name.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2366
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WUT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2367
text_en: What do you have?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2368
text_en: a way to play piano, play any music really, without thinking about 'Void Tongue'

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2369
text_en: Sign me up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2370
text_en: Not right now. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2371
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_JOY>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2372
text_en: I have a way to play piano, play any music really, without thinking about 'Void Tongue'

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2373
text_en: or mayyyybe i'm getting ahead of myself. well, what is Void Tongue?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2374
text_en: let us begin first with: why music? why piano?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2375
text_en: it's easier to start a piano lesson this way because umm, i can't find a piano. so let's stick to theory.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2376
text_en: That's not easy to answer. Sounds, words, utterances from the Void. A curse, more like it. A communication of something to whatever ears can hear it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2377
text_en: It's something I never want to hear again.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2378
text_en: It's the language of what is causing all this, I think. How it speaks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2379
text_en: How hard did you look?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2380
text_en: Where would we find a piano?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2381
text_en: Ok, let's stick to theory.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2382
text_en: yay! so, to really catch you up, music has been really important here for like, ever. guys and girls would sit at a piano instead of a tv and just create.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2383
text_en: playing... writing... really a song is a bit like communicating through music. you don't even need lyrics!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2384
text_en: but imagine it - creating something for this world of ours that can make people cry? dance? sing? it's magic to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2385
text_en: well, kinda hard? i wasn't sure about going into empty apartments out there...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2386
text_en: hmm, they're big and hard to hide... I doubt that Viktor and Scaldra play.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2387
text_en: ugh. Scaldra. they probably destroyed them. why would they let something hopeful like an instrument survive this place?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2388
text_en: but wait, let me ask u then, if there is music in the future, maybe there's hope. so...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2389
text_en: Magic? I don't think so. I do like a good song, though.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2390
text_en: Music has been a part of what I've been through. Memories through songs, I get it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2391
text_en: Please. tell me about a song then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2392
text_en: maybe u'll believe me one day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2393
text_en: wut <RETRO_EMOJI_OHNO>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2394
text_en: like a bad song, then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2395
text_en: Let's leave it at that. [End.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2396
text_en: In a way, I guess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2397
text_en: is it like, a sing-songy language or?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2398
text_en: well now i really need to get you some music. think about it. drown out this 'Void Tongue' with a song of your own, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2399
text_en: I don't really know how to describe it. But it's powerful.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2400
text_en: It's nothing you want to hear. It's part of why all this is happening.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2401
text_en: It's powerful enough to change life. There's these animals I know. Friends, I'd say. The Cavia. They touched the Void and learned to *speak* like magic.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2402
text_en: don't call me stupid but have u tried playing music for them? your friends? maybe it would help even for 1 second?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2403
text_en: And when they speak now, it started so hopeless. So wrong. The Void Tongue just let these creatures feel one thing at first: hopeless.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2404
text_en: It is the cause of so much pain.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2405
text_en: I can't stand to hear it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2406
text_en: But even still, I feel like I know how to speak it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2407
text_en: And that scares me. It's like a song I want to unhear. Like a magic curse that should be GONE.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2408
text_en: it's ok, it's ok. i get it. music can feel hopeless too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2409
text_en: don't you think music could break through and be hope? for just, well, everyone? everything? if Void Tongue is 'magic', than so is music.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2410
text_en: You've listened to too many songs, maybe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2411
text_en: Play a song for me, won't you then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2412
text_en: well, just ur opinion. thanks for hearing me out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2413
text_en: always!!!!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2414
text_en: Music can define memories. "Smiles from Juran" is a song I heard in the mind, the memories, of someone who lost everything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2415
text_en: Music can be hopeful. There's something about knowing "We All Lift Together", right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2416
text_en: Music can be evil, Aoi. These people that I tried to save, they were cursed by song. "For Narmer", they sang out.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2417
text_en: Picture it. Everything is taken from you - family, life, your own sense of self.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2418
text_en: Finding joy through song, meaning, shared experience.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2419
text_en: You don't know what it's like to see that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2420
text_en: And one song, just one song, is the very groundwork for you to find yourself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2421
text_en: It's fun. It's hopeful. A lot of us don't get to choose our life circumstances.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2422
text_en: Sol I'm so sorry, please, tell me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2423
text_en: I like to think if I ever lost myself, music would be a way for me to find my way.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2424
text_en: But we can still choose to sing together, about it all. About nothing. Just sing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2425
text_en: Telling you here on this almost feels wrong, I wish I could sing it to you, but if I can say anything it's that evil...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2426
text_en: Evil will try and ruin the good. I've seen it happen to music. No one should ever sing praise to the damned.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2427
text_en: what ur saying...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2428
text_en: it feels like, well, how i feel. that feels like a law of the universe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2429
text_en: Music is powerful.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2430
text_en: this is embarassing but, i have a similar story. not nearly as heavy but still.. maybe you'll understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2431
text_en: when i was a kid, like 'kid Aoi', i wanted to be friends with everyone.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2432
text_en: Sounds like the Aoi I know.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2433
text_en: Really? Aoi being Friendly?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2434
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2435
text_en: i'll ignore that!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2436
text_en: but there was this one kid, who the bullies would ALWAYS pick on. Always.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2437
text_en: and they would sing mean songs about the kid. awful, mean songs.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2438
text_en: and when i saw music being used to cause pain, it broke something in me as a kid. i didn't understand.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2439
text_en: i still don't understand. but i knew then that i could fight back without raising a fist, even if it meant embarrassing myself.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2440
text_en: So what did you do?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2441
text_en: Did you embarrass yourself?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2442
text_en: i sang louder than the bullies. it was a stupid song, i don't even remember how it went.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2443
text_en: but it worked.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2444
text_en: and when they tried to bully me, they would throw CD's at me, but guess what?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2445
text_en: You crushed them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2446
text_en: ha! nope. i got free music! score for Aoi!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2447
text_en: i guess wut i'm hoping you know and everyone here, is that i'd sing louder for all of you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo7_2448
text_en: The CDs were made of metal?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo7_2449
text_en: always.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2450
text_en: Remember that game I was telling you about with Amir?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2451
text_en: [Ignore.]

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2452
text_en: Hey Aoi! You like Amir, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2453
text_en: You're a fan of games, right Aoi?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2454
text_en: yeah..?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2455
text_en: yeah!! y?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2456
text_en: like what kind?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2457
text_en: I feel like I screwed up asking you if you'd like to join. I'm sorry. We'd really love it if you joined the game with us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2458
text_en: Could you just please join? Amir won't stop bothering me about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2459
text_en: ... i was actually really hoping u'd ask again

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2460
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WUT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2461
text_en: i'd love to play

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2462
text_en: Amir's trying to get a game of "Fables & Frontiers" together. It's a board game where everybody makes characters and plays pretend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2463
text_en: Amir's trying to get a game of "Fables & Frontiers" together. It's a game where we all tell a story together and use chance to add some excitement to it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2464
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_STARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2465
text_en: ooooo that sounds fun!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2466
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PUMPEDUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2467
text_en: like what kind of play pretend? ... r people gonna make fun of me for playing?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2468
text_en: Eh, it's just a silly game. It's a waste of time but I'm trying to be nice.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2469
text_en: If they do, they'll have to go through me. <RETRO_EMOJI_KNIFE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2470
text_en: Who cares? It'll be fun! And it'll mean a lot to Amir.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2471
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HORRIFIED>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2472
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_OHNO>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2474
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GIVELOVE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2475
text_en: count me in!! oh oh oh do you think he'll let me play a character that has pets?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2473
text_en: ... i think i'm good...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2476
text_en: LOL. I think you can play as a druid, yeah. They have familiars. Like cats and things.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo8_2477
text_en: I'm sure you can.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2478
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_AOICAT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo8_2479
text_en: i think it'll mean the world to amir to have everybody around the table playing... he's like me. big heart <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo1_3104
text_en: I'll tell that one to you in person over drinks.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo1_3105
text_en: lol sounds like a lot, yeah

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2480
text_en: I've never thanked u for being so cool with Eleanor

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2481
text_en: so thank u <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2482
text_en: People doubted Eleanor? Seriously?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2483
text_en: I find it hard to believe Arthur ever tolerated people being wary of his sister.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2484
text_en: in the early days, Lettie and Quincy had their doubts. they worried she might go full-tech-rot. Arthur wouldn’t hear it, so they kept their concerns quiet, but we all felt it on some level. and if *we* sensed it, imagine how sharp and clear it was to Eleanor

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2485
text_en: u wouldn’t have been the first in the Hex to be wary of Eleanor. and, trust me, I love everyone in the Hex, so I would've understood—but I also would’ve worked hard to change ur mind.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2486
text_en: Of course. She’s part of the Hex.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2487
text_en: You don’t need to thank me, but I appreciate it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2488
text_en: You were worried I would be mean to her?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2489
text_en: That must have been unbearable for her, always knowing what people were thinking.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2490
text_en: Thank Sol for Arthur. He’s a good brother.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2491
text_en: I’m really disappointed in Lettie and Quincy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2492
text_en: he is, ya. but I think that made things even harder for Eleanor back then. he was desperate to protect her, and she knew that if he ever believed she was suffering too much because of the infestation, he might take matters into his own hands

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2493
text_en: they were just scared. fear makes people act in strange ways.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2494
text_en: You’re saying he might’ve... killed his own sister?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2495
text_en: The fear of losing control must have been terrifying. Especially with Arthur watching over her like that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2496
text_en: Clearly, the team has come a long way since then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2497
text_en: I wish they could have seen past their fear back then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2498
text_en: I never thought he would kill her, but Eleanor did. why she thought that is between her and Arthur. I’m just glad she doesn’t feel that way anymore.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2499
text_en: It’s hard to imagine her carrying that kind of fear on top of everything else.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2500
text_en: Did she ever come close to leaving because of it?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2501
text_en: I’ve heard it said that what really traumatizes people isn’t what happens to them, but how they react to it. knowing who Lettie and Quincy are at heart, I’m sure if their fear had led to anything happening to Eleanor, they’d never have forgiven themselves.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2502
text_en: It’s hard to blame them for being human, I guess.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2503
text_en: Did it almost come to that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2504
text_en: after her transformation, Eleanor paid close attention to how everyone reacted.
