I could see her weighing her options, thinking she might do more harm than good by staying. she wanted to help the Hex, but the way some people looked at her made her wonder if she could help more from a distance.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2505
text_en: That’s so unfair. They didn’t see how much she was willing to give up for the Hex.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2506
text_en: That’s ridiculous. With psychic powers like hers? She’s invaluable.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2507
text_en: she thought she could use her powers from afar, stay connected without burdening us with her presence.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2508
text_en: I see. She was willing to sacrifice being with the team just to make them feel safe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2509
text_en: Being alone in Höllvania would have put her in so much danger.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2510
text_en: one night, when even Amir had gone to sleep, she actually did almost leave. quietly, in the dead of night. she didn’t even want to burden us with goodbyes.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2511
text_en: That’s heartbreaking.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2512
text_en: Luckily for everyone, she clearly didn't.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2513
text_en: She must have felt so alone at that moment.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2514
text_en: I hate to imagine what could have happened... I’d been keeping an eye on her tho, trying to be there for her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2515
text_en: u know that feeling when ur with someone but they’re not really there? when their mind keeps drifting, no matter how much they try to stay present? I noticed that...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2516
text_en: It sounds like you were exactly what she needed in that moment.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2517
text_en: When it comes to the team's happiness, nothing gets past you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2518
text_en: So it was you. You’re the reason she stayed.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2519
text_en: the second I sensed her atomicycle booting up, I locked down every atomicycle in the garage and ran out to stop her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2520
text_en: I wasn't sure how much of her distance was just her learning to manage her psychic powers or her consciously checking how people saw her. so, I started keeping tabs on her too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2521
text_en: That was brave.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2522
text_en: I’m glad you were there for her. That night probably changed everything for her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_3102
text_en: I would’ve let her go if that’s what she really wanted. but she wasn’t leaving without a heart-to-heart with me first, haha.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2523
text_en: That’s so you haha. I’m guessing the heart-to-heart went well?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2524
text_en: And that heart-to-heart probably saved her—and the Hex.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2525
text_en: Sometimes, the simplest things make the biggest difference.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2526
text_en: oh, we talked until the sun came up. since Amir was asleep, we even played some pinball—just the two of us.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2527
text_en: it was silly and fun, the kind of fun Eleanor desperately needed.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2528
text_en: How did you convince her that everything was okay?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2529
text_en: I don’t think it was any one thing I said. it was just... being there. being a friend.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2530
text_en: it was the first time since her transformation that someone showed her she was more than Arthur’s fragile sister to be protected. I think that night helped her see she could carve out her own place in the Hex.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2531
text_en: I’m glad you did that. She needed it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2532
text_en: That’s what true leadership looks like, Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2533
text_en: I need it too, honestly. we’re all stronger when we know we belong.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2534
text_en: Eleanor’s stronger than people give her credit for, but having you by her side made all the difference.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2535
text_en: Well, I commend you for keeping the team together.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2536
text_en: I guess I just realized, having u join us, we could have relived that whole awful chapter again

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2537
text_en: but we didn't have to. u understood right away

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2538
text_en: so thank u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2539
text_en: Eleanor deserves to be seen for the amazing woman she is.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2540
text_en: Thanks for being there for Eleanor.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2541
text_en: It was nothing. We've got to have each other's backs.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo1_2542
text_en: You're the glue that holds this team together, Aoi.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo1_2543
text_en: ur one of my favorite people <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> just so u know

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2544
text_en: You know, you've mentioned Lettie a few times, but you've never told me much about your friendship with her.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2545
text_en: What's the deal with you and Lettie? You two get along, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2546
text_en: huh. I suppose that's true!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2547
text_en: yes! very well!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2548
text_en: not like "rock out to On-lyne and do magazine quizzes together" well

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2549
text_en: but we confide in each other

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2550
text_en: she was really there for me when Arthur and I broke up

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2551
text_en: there was this time Arthur and I had a reeeally bad argument

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2552
text_en: Lettie was really there for me. Words of wisdom, pounds of chocolate. the whole deal! we all know she can heal wounds, but when she puts her mind to it, she can heal hurt feelings too <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2553
text_en: What was the argument about?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2554
text_en: How exactly did Arthur hurt your feelings so badly?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2555
text_en: oh that? gosh it was so long ago umm... it was just this little... break up

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2556
text_en: I would have thought you'd go to Eleanor for comfort.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2557
text_en: I thought your best pal, Amir would've had your back.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2558
text_en: That sounds just like Lettie.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2559
text_en: You and Arthur dated?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2560
text_en: Broke up? As in stopped dating? As in you dated ARTHUR?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2561
text_en: Oh. Damn. Sorry, Aoi. That must have been tough.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2562
text_en: his sister? are u kidding?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2563
text_en: lol weeell he did, but he wasn't the best at comforting me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2564
text_en: Yeah. She's very wise <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2565
text_en: supriiiise ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2566
text_en: it was... for a bit. we're all good now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2567
text_en: "Amir, I love u, but I need something more than a two-player game of Caliber Chicks to feel better"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2568
text_en: Arthur's brooding got to you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2569
text_en: I thought you handled the breakup like a pro.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2570
text_en: I was under the impression you and Arthur were really mature about everything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2571
text_en: weeell, I was kind of embarrassed at first

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2572
text_en: You don't have to tell me about it if you don't want to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2573
text_en: If you're willing to tell me what happened, I'd really like to hear it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2574
text_en: Do I ever feel like an idiot for missing this. Want to fill me in?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2575
text_en: u know what they say! don't dip ur pen in the company ink

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2616
text_en: my exact words to Arthur were, "ur right. now that you mention it, we don't have time for this relationship either."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2577
text_en: ur not an idiot! it's just that... I didn't want to talk about it until we were close

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2578
text_en: in the future, do u still celebrate venusia? it's the holiday around love and acceptance

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2579
text_en: Well, I'm all ears now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2580
text_en: I guess I can understand that. We're close now, right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2581
text_en: yes <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> so it's time I fill u in

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2582
text_en: in the future, do u still celebrate venusia? it's the holiday around love and acceptance

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2617
text_en: I can imagine the shock on Arthur's face.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2618
text_en: So, you ended things right there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2619
text_en: oh well. what's done is done.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2620
text_en: there wouldn't have been much point. they were soaked and torn - ruined

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2621
text_en: looking back, destroying those cranes just hurt me more. could have saved that wish for myself ha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2622
text_en: Oh Aoi... all your hard work...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2623
text_en: Arthur should have run into the road and picked them up anyway.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2624
text_en: I threw the cranes onto the road. didn't take long for a tank to drive over them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2625
text_en: Whatever happened, I promise it's okay.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2626
text_en: Feeling upset is nothing to be ashamed of.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2627
text_en: maybe if I'd taken time to understand myself sooner, I would've reacted in a way I'd be proud of...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2628
text_en: I don't want to discount your feelings, but I can see where Arthur was coming from. He was focused on the mission.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2629
text_en: every spare second I had between meals or before bed, I'd sneak off, all excited about how happy a venusia surprise was gonna make him

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2630
text_en: Aoi, I'm sorry. I can't imagine how much that hurt you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2631
text_en: Wow. That's incredibly thoughtful, and takes so much time and skill. Truly, an act of love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2632
text_en: u know, I think I needed to hear that more than I realized. thx <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2633
text_en: heh... in the moment, I had a similar feeling

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2634
text_en: ...Wishing I could punch Arthur right now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2635
text_en: I could too, but understanding only gets u so far. when something deep within says something's off, eventually u just have to listen

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2636
text_en: it was like something snapped. all this time I'd spent understanding him... had he really done the same for me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2637
text_en: he just said, "thanks, but we really dont have time for this kind of thing."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_3130
text_en: now go out and have an awesome day, k?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2639
text_en: Arthur was lucky to be with someone who cared so much about making him happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2640
text_en: it was like something snapped. all this time I'd spent understanding him... had he really done the same for me?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2641
text_en: u know, I think I needed to hear that more than I realized. thx <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2642
text_en: heh... in the moment, I had a similar feeling

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2643
text_en: I could too, but understanding only gets u so far. when something deep within says something's off, eventually u just have to listen

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2644
text_en: ...Wishing I could punch Arthur right now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2645
text_en: Aoi, I'm sorry. I can't imagine how much that hurt you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2646
text_en: I don't want to discount your feelings, but I can see where Arthur was coming from. He was focused on the mission.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2647
text_en: he just said, "thanks, but we really dont have time for this kind of thing."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2648
text_en: looking back, it's kind of embarrassing. I had built up his reaction in my head and then when I gave him the cranes...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2649
text_en: Arthur was lucky to be with someone who cared so much about making him happy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2650
text_en: Wow. That's incredibly thoughtful, and takes so much time and skill. Truly, an act of love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2651
text_en: every spare second I had between meals or before bed, I'd sneak off, all excited about how happy a venusia surprise was gonna make him

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2583
text_en: so I spent weeks folding 1000 paper cranes for him. they're supposed to be good luck, u know? and 1000 are supposed to grant a wish

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2584
text_en: we were out on a peacekeeping mission with the ICR but I still wanted to celebrate venusia in some way

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2585
text_en: and I u <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2586
text_en: it was a fight during venusia that ultimately ended things between me and Arthur

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2587
text_en: that was the first time he saw me really upset. I think it took him by surprise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2588
text_en: that was the first time he saw me really upset. I think it took him by surprise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2589
text_en: We do, but we call it Star Days.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2590
text_en: We call it Star Days, and there's someone on Venus who I think would love to know that they built on an old tradition, even if she didn't realize it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2591
text_en: We call it Star Days, and there's someone on Venus who I think would love to know that they built on an old tradition, even if she didn't realize it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2592
text_en: We do, but we call it Star Days.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2593
text_en: it makes me happy to know that people still celebrate something like it in the future ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2594
text_en: I think I'd get along well with that person ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2595
text_en: I think I'd get along well with that person ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2596
text_en: it makes me happy to know that people still celebrate something like it in the future ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2597
text_en: Well, they certainly do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2598
text_en: Yeah, some people are really into it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2599
text_en: One of my favorite holidays

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2600
text_en: She'd adore you. So, what happened between you and Arthur during Venusia?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2601
text_en: Did something bad happen to you during Venusia?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2602
text_en: Well, they certainly do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2603
text_en: Yeah, some people are really into it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2604
text_en: One of my favorite holidays

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2605
text_en: if u managed to pull an explanation out of Arthur - and that's a big IF - he'd probably say our fight on venusia ended the relationship

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2606
text_en: I'd hate to see you really upset.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2607
text_en: I'm sure he deserved it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2608
text_en: I'm sure he deserved it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2609
text_en: I'd hate to see you really upset.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2610
text_en: heh. maybe...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2611
text_en: that's sweet of u <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2612
text_en: we were out on a peacekeeping mission with the ICR but I still wanted to celebrate venusia in some way

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2613
text_en: so I spent weeks folding 1000 paper cranes for him. they're supposed to be good luck, u know? and 1000 are supposed to grant a wish

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2614
text_en: I dunno. it's not really about who "deserved" what. it just came down to us being too different.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2652
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2653
text_en: Anytime

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2654
text_en: I'm always here if you need me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2655
text_en: thx for listening

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2656
text_en: I really didn't expect to feel this good after sharing that story. there's just something about u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2657
text_en: ur making me blush

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2658
text_en: ur very easy to open up to :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2659
text_en: You amaze me, Aoi. Someone who truly sees and loves people for who they are deserves a partner who will do the same.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2660
text_en: Thank you for opening up to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2661
text_en: I know Arthur cares about me. we'll always respect each other, but when it comes to love, that's not enough

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2662
text_en: breaking down a broody facade only to constantly brush off eye rolls and good-natured jokes is... exhausting

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2663
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2664
text_en: Thank you for opening up to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2665
text_en: Anytime

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2666
text_en: thx for listening

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2667
text_en: it's not like I expect my partner to like everything I like, but I need the chance to share happiness

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2668
text_en: we couldn't even, say... listen to On-lyne together. even if I convinced him to, he wouldn't enjoy it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2669
text_en: well, of course, we'll always have each other's backs

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2670
text_en: sure but it's water under the bridge

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2671
text_en: Uh oh...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2672
text_en: I threw the cranes onto the road. didn't take long for a tank to drive over them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2673
text_en: Okay seems like a bit of an overreaction...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2674
text_en: Oh Aoi... all your hard work...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2675
text_en: looking back, destroying those cranes just hurt me more. could have saved that wish for myself ha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2676
text_en: maybe

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2677
text_en: but that's the truth of how it went down. now u know

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2678
text_en: So, you ended things right there?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2679
text_en: I can imagine the shock on Arthur's face.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2680
text_en: ya that about sums it up

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2681
text_en: It's admirable that you're still close friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2682
text_en: Feeling upset is nothing to be ashamed of.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2683
text_en: I'm sure a lot more than just that one fight led to the breakup.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2684
text_en: maybe if I'd taken time to understand myself sooner, I would've reacted in a way I'd be proud of...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2685
text_en: I'm sure a lot more than just that one fight led to the breakup.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2686
text_en: I just realized I couldn't ask him to be someone he wasn't. he was never gonna find joy in simple things with me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2687
text_en: It's admirable that you're still close friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2615
text_en: ur someone I trust, someone I want to know on a deep level. it's only right that I share that same depth with you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2688
text_en: I've never heard that saying in my life.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2689
text_en: That's gotta be a 1999 thing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2690
text_en: Uh... who says that? And what does it mean?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2691
text_en: right... so that saying doesn't survive into the future then?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2692
text_en: oh uh yes. sorry, do you even have companies in the future? or... ink?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2693
text_en: everyone with a sense of self-preservation!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2694
text_en: it basically means u should never date someone u work with

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2695
text_en: That's dumb.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2696
text_en: Oh. Make sense.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2697
text_en: Huh. You learn something new every day.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2698
text_en: ya well, I totally started spiraling wondering what everyone thought after Arthur and I broke up... in my very public ground-covered-in-paper-cranes kinda way

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2699
text_en: "only a girl as dumb as Aoi would think a relationship with our commander could end well"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2700
text_en: "hey at least we can all stop worrying about her getting special treatment now"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2701
text_en: Okay whoa. I'm going to stop you right there. How could you think anyone thought that way about you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2702
text_en: Brutal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2703
text_en: I've lived long enough to figure out how mean and gossipy people can be.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2704
text_en: For Sol's sake, why spare a thought for people like that? I doubt anybody was thinking mean things about you, but even if they were, they were wrong.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2705
text_en: Aoi, how exceptional you are speaks for itself. Anybody who might have had the audacity to say something like that was just threatened.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2706
text_en: ya. I'm so glad Lettie talked me down.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2707
text_en: I mean... knowing that is one thing. internalizing it is another.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2708
text_en: ok maybe but... I want to help people. make them happy. not threaten them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2709
text_en: I guess so.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2710
text_en: The way you care so much about others is one of your best traits. I hate to think it ever causes you feel so sad.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2711
text_en: that's a really kind thing to say <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> but don't worry. I've come a long way since then.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2712
text_en: Not people like that. Screw people like that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2713
text_en: Some people are beyond help.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2714
text_en: You do help people. So many people. Never forget how amazing that makes you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2715
text_en: u know, I'm glad Lettie was there for me, but u clearly would have been great too <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2716
text_en: I have a hard time believing that, but I know ur probably right

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2717
text_en: I guess. thx for saying that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2718
text_en: Did you go to Lettie or did she come to you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2719
text_en: So, what did Lettie do?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2720
text_en: she came looking for me when she heard the news. armed with chocolate.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2721
text_en: when I tell u I bore my soul to her the second she offered me that chocolate ...

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2722
text_en: Chocolate... made you cry?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2723
text_en: You clearly needed  someone to be there for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2724
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HORRIFIED>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2725
text_en: there I was putting on a brave face and Lettie disarmed me in a second

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2726
text_en: it sounds totally nuts when u put it like that

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2727
text_en: no, Lettie's kindness made me cry

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2728
text_en: I'm glad Lettie was there for you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2729
text_en: That Lettie knows what she's doing.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2730
text_en: and while I had a mouthful of the most delicious chocolate I've had in my life, she told me, "no matter what happened, no matter how it ended, if u did it for love, it was right. never doubt that."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2731
text_en: in that confident tone of hers... it was exactly what I needed to hear. I really held onto that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2732
text_en: Yeah, I can't imagine anyone being more reassuring.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2733
text_en: Damn. How was it seeing Arthur after all that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2734
text_en: heh. totally weird for like a month. but I was ok.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2735
text_en: she's the real deal

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2736
text_en: Lettie and Amir stuck with me. I never had to endure an awkward silence alone with Arthur or anything like that thanks to them haha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2737
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_WHOA>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2738
text_en: Wow. Well, I asked for a picture of your friendship with Lettie. Now I really get it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2739
text_en: Sounds like everyone was picking sides.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2740
text_en: Hey, if you ever go through a breakup, she's the one to talk to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2741
text_en: Clearly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2742
text_en: I'd rather come to you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2743
text_en: Even if the breakup is between me and her?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2744
text_en: no way, I didn't see it that way at all!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2745
text_en: Haha you didn't see it that way, because everyone was picking your side.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2746
text_en: Okay, maybe you're just surrounded by good friends.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2747
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_PASSGLASSES>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2748
text_en: that would be fine too ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2749
text_en: or me if u want, but that goes without saying

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2750
text_en: come again?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2751
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SWEAT>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2752
text_en: yes! let's put it that way ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2753
text_en: Just a thought.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2754
text_en: Don't worry about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2755
text_en: Kidding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2756
text_en: Hard to believe so much happened before I showed up.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo2_2757
text_en: There's a lot of history with you Hex. Forms quite a bond.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2758
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_COOLARMSUP>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2759
text_en: if u say so

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2760
text_en: ok um well... in that hypothetical scenario, no. maybe don't talk to her about that particular breakup. ya.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2761
text_en: hey, there was always a place waiting for u. even when we didn't see it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo2_2762
text_en: we're in our best chapter yet if u ask me

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2763
text_en: You’ve got to be the strongest hero in the Hex. I mean, considering everyone here is partly metal, you're definitely not one to be messed with.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2764
text_en: I’ve been thinking, out of everyone on the team, your instinct to always look out for others makes you the most heroic of us all.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2765
text_en: haha

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2766
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2767
text_en: u sound just like Amir

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2768
text_en: Why thank you. How so?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2769
text_en: First time in my life I've been told that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2770
text_en: Really? What makes you say that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2771
text_en: Is that a compliment?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2772
text_en: really? but u two are so alike ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2773
text_en: of course it is!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2774
text_en: it's just that when Amir first joined the Hex, he’d joke about me being this superhero

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2775
text_en: ... and him being my sidekick

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2776
text_en: it was sweet but also a little sad

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2777
text_en: A sidekick, huh? That doesn’t sound like the Amir I know now. What changed?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2778
text_en: That’s surprising. Amir always seems so confident.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2779
text_en: Sad? I thought you two were close.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2780
text_en: it took time. Amir joined us without any military experience, so the fighting was overwhelming for him

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2781
text_en: oh, we are! Amir’s my best friend. some of my favorite memories are us in the arcade, gaming and rocking out to On-lyne

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2782
text_en: he just needed to see that being a hero wasn’t all about combat

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2783
text_en: but the whole sidekick thing? I could tell he felt... small.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2784
text_en: I always knew that a hacker as great as him could be a hero in his own way

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2785
text_en: And you played a big part in helping him realize that, didn’t you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2786
text_en: I can’t take all the credit, but I was there when he had his breakthrough.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2787
text_en: So what changed for him? He doesn’t seem like anyone's sidekick now.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2788
text_en: one day, I caught this wild broadcast from an On-lyne fan who'd pieced together some shady details about HitMaker (that's On-lyne's label)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2789
text_en: How'd Amir get involved in something like that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2790
text_en: she was basically begging for someone to help them, and Amir jumped in without hesitation

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2791
text_en: Amir? I thought it would have been you running to On-lyne's rescue.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2792
text_en: This sounds like a legendary Aoi-Amir team-up to me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2793
text_en: I showed him the broadcast. Amir took care of the rest!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2794
text_en: weeell it was a team effort. u could say I was his sidekick ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2795
text_en: a super-fan joining forces with a super-hacker? nothing could stop us!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2796
text_en: he hacked into their manager's emails and uncovered a mess of deals with the Scaldra. they’d been cloning the band and putting them in danger, all covered up by their management

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2797
text_en: bleh!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2798
text_en: without Amir’s skills, none of that would’ve come to light

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2799
text_en: Wow. That’s incredible. Amir really uncovered all that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2800
text_en: You know, if it's true that knowledge is power, hackers really are powerful.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2801
text_en: u bet. the whole ordeal totally helped him realized he wasn’t just a sidekick. he was a hero in his own right ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2802
text_en: As if there could ever have been any doubt.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2803
text_en: And you still get to rock out in the arcade together

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2804
text_en: just two heroes taking a break!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2805
text_en: right?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2806
text_en: ur a hero too, u know <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2807
text_en: Makes me feel awfully good hearing that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2808
text_en: That means a lot coming from you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo3_2809
text_en: You charmer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2810
text_en: oh u <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2811
text_en: good! <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo3_2812
text_en: guilty ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2813
text_en: Quincy told me he'd kill me if I ever told anyone this story

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2814
text_en: but he's all talk and u and I are so very close now so I'm just gonna get it off my chest

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2815
text_en: sorry ur involved now <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2816
text_en: Uuh no I'm not. Don't tell me. I'm not signing up for a problem with Quincy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2817
text_en: Tell me everything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2818
text_en: u sure? last chance!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2819
text_en: Who am I kidding? Yes, tell me everything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2820
text_en: k! can't say I blame u

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2821
text_en: I'm sure.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2822
text_en: ok, so we were on this mission to sabotage Scaldra weapon production. I was doing the metalwork, Quincy had my back, watching for any patrols.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2823
text_en: it went supers smoothly! exactly as planned, but on our way back, we got stopped by a bunch of kids. they recognized Quincy instantly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2824
text_en: Sorry, was that a typo? I'm sure you meant "we got stopped by a bunch of SCALDRA who recognized Quincy instantly."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2825
text_en: Oh no. Those poor kids must have been terrified.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2826
text_en: Kids?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2827
text_en: nope, I mean it! kids! cute, smiley, not-at-all-scared-of-Quincy's-angry-mug kids!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2828
text_en: not quite!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2829
text_en: u heard me!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2830
text_en: Well, what did he do?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2831
text_en: So, what did he do when they stopped him?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2832
text_en: guess!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2833
text_en: Used colorful language and no uncertain terms to tell them to get out of his way?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2834
text_en: Ignored them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2835
text_en: Shoved past them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2836
text_en: Was he... really nice to them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2837
text_en: see, that's totally what I thought was going to happen, but no!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2838
text_en: why yes he was! you know our Quincy better than I thought <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2839
text_en: he SMILED at them. it was like he forgot I was there for sec. dropped the whole tough guy act

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2840
text_en: Those kids must have adored him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2841
text_en: You're kidding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2842
text_en: They knew him from POSITIVE interactions?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2843
text_en: he knew them by name! "Hey Miko, I found one of those tammpets you told me about. Swiped it for ya."

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2844
text_en: I swear on Zeke's life!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2845
text_en: He... said that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2846
text_en: You're definitely kidding.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2847
text_en: So, Quincy went on a side quest to find a tammpet for some Höllvanian kid?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2848
text_en: Quincy actually pulled one of those little digital pet things out of his pocket and gave it to the kid.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2849
text_en: Sol only knows how long he'd had it, or how long he'd spent searching through Höllvania to find it

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2850
text_en: once that funny little horned creature appeared on the screen, I don't know who was smiling bigger. the kid or Quincy seeing the kid so happy

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2851
text_en: You know, now that I'm picturing it, that really does sound like him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2852
text_en: You'll have to excuse me for finding this story hard to believe.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2853
text_en: You're lucky you got to see that side of him. I bet few people ever do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2854
text_en: u think? either ur hella good at reading people or u and Quincy have a special bond <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2855
text_en: I know, right? I was stunned.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2856
text_en: of course then he looked me dead in the eye and said, "if u tell anybody about this, I'll kill u"

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2857
text_en: Classic Quincy.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2858
text_en: You risked your life to tell me this story?!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2859
text_en: Your secret is safe with me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2860
text_en: Looks like you've signed your death warrant.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2861
text_en: ya <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2862
text_en: psssh he doesn't scare me! how could he now that I know what a big softy he is? ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2863
text_en: aaw it's ok u don't need to keep it secret <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART> I'm prepared to face the consequences

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2864
text_en: at least the story will live on through u ^_^

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2865
text_en: he pretends he’s all about the mission, but deep down, he’s got a heart of gold. he still goes out sometimes just to bring a bit of happiness to those kids

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2866
text_en: Aren't you kind of betray his trust telling me all this though?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2867
text_en: Think he could find me a tammpet?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2868
text_en: Honestly, it's nice to hear such a happy story about our brooding sniper.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2869
text_en: LOL maybe! we've gotta find his supplier for sure

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2870
text_en: I knew u'd appreciate it!

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2871
text_en: aah he knew I'd tell. If he really cared, he would have just asked me not to. not made some empty threat.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2872
text_en: this tale does arm u with powerful knowledge. promise to only use this power for good?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2873
text_en: Nah, I'm going to make fun of him.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2874
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPYHAND>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2875
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SMITTEN>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2876
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_GLARE>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2877
text_en: Okay. I promise.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2878
text_en: Pinky swear.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2879
text_en: u do that, and I crush u with every piece of metal on ur body

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2880
text_en: gosh we make a good team

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2881
text_en: Quincy? Is that you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo4_2882
text_en: Guess that's the end of me wearing metal.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo4_2883
text_en: LOL! just play nice with our Quincy, k?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2884
text_en: One thing I really admire about you is your unwavering commitment to building a better world. Where does that come from?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2885
text_en: You’ve got an impressive amount of drive. What lights the fire under you?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2886
text_en: oh wow thank u for saying that. umm... hmm. there’s no big defining moment that determined my life path or anything.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2887
text_en: as far as I can tell, I inherited it from my parents. they were practical people, but dreamers too

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2888
text_en: I mean, you don’t build rockets to explore space if you're not a dreamer.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2889
text_en: Wait. Your parents built rockets?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2890
text_en: That’s one hell of a family business. Sounds like they set the bar high.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2891
text_en: That’s not exactly a common family legacy. Did they ever talk about what inspired them?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2892
text_en: well, dad did. and mom knew how to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2893
text_en: ya... and when I became a soldier, they made it pretty clear it wasn't exactly the life they'd hoped to build for me.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2894
text_en: not much. they weren’t big on sharing their dreams out loud. I think they believed their contributions to the world would do the talking for them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2895
text_en: dad was an aerospace engineer. mom taught space systems design at the university where they met as students.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2896
text_en: They must’ve been fascinating to talk to.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2897
text_en: Wow your house was one part think tank, one part launch pad.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2898
text_en: They sound like they were brilliant. Must’ve been incredible to grow up around that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2899
text_en: yeah, I suppose so

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2900
text_en: haha not really. mostly, it was just quiet.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2901
text_en: a lot of our conversations were "hey, sweetie" and "hi" in passing. then they’d grab dinner on the way to their offices to work late or whatever

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2902
text_en: but most of our conversations were just "hey, sweetie" and "hi" as we passed each other in the kitchen. they’d grab something quick to eat and head back to their offices to work late

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2903
text_en: they were busy

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2904
text_en: as long as I wasn’t getting into trouble, they didn’t worry about me much. and despite all the fire I had inside, I was really good at staying out of trouble.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2905
text_en: I get that. My parents were always busy too. Running the Zariman ship was a full-time effort for everyone. Still, we always made time to sit down for meals together at least.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2906
text_en: That makes sense. When work pulls you in that hard, there’s not much time left over, but I bet they thought about you constantly.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2907
text_en: Can’t say I blame them. I know firsthand that space travel doesn’t leave much room for downtime. Sounds like you made their lives easier by keeping your head down.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2908
text_en: yeah, I guess I did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2909
text_en: that's nice. I’m glad they did that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2910
text_en: maybe

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2911
text_en: I realize now how important those moments are, but when I was growing up, it didn’t feel weird not to have many of them.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2912
text_en: actually ya, I think that's true :)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2913
text_en: I hope I did.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2914
text_en: I get why my parents were so focused on their work. in their own way, it was how they showed love. they wanted to provide for me and build technology that could help humanity have a better future

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2915
text_en: looking back, it’s kind of beautiful

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2916
text_en: Maybe so, but it still doesn’t sit right with me that their daughter didn’t get more time with them. We only have so much time in this life, you know? We should spend as much of it as we can with the people we love.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2917
text_en: Beautiful, sure, but practical too. They were doing something that mattered, and you don’t get much more important than that.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2918
text_en: It’s a powerful kind of love, even if it’s not the kind that sits around a dinner table.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2919
text_en: it’s the "as much of it as we can" part that’s tricky, isn’t it? hard to measure

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2920
text_en: still, I can't help but think about how we didn’t spend much time together.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2921
text_en: right! not the kind u see in movies, but very real.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2922
text_en: if I ever see them again, I’ll make sure to make up for lost time. I know they will too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2923
text_en: You know, that drive of yours to make the world better... it’s deeper than you give yourself credit for. You should take more pride in it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2924
text_en: oh? how so?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2925
text_en: I hope you get that chance. You’ve got a heart full of hope and strength. I think they’d be proud of who you’ve become.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2926
text_en: that means a lot to me. I hope so too.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2927
text_en: Fair enough. Just don’t waste time feeling bad about it now. They made their choices, and you’ve made yours. Looks like you’re doing fine with what they gave you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2928
text_en: I guess so

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2929
text_en: You’ve taken everything they gave you and built on it—not just with dreams and drive, but compassion too. That’s not easy to do.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2930
text_en: It sounds to me like you’ve grown into the kind of loving, attentive person you needed when you were younger. That’s something worth being proud of.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2931
text_en: You’ve got their brains and drive, but you’ve made it your own. That’s what counts.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2932
text_en: that's... actually a really cool way to think about it.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank5Convo5_2933
text_en: I’ve never thought about it like that before. that's... a really lovely way to see it. thank you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank5Convo5_2934

text_en: oml you remembered? <RETRO_EMOJI_HAPPY1> thank youuuuu!

text_en:
i’m not and it’s not
but ty anyway

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiBirthdayConvo2_3114
text_en: We come alive, under the neon glow… it’s the party of your BIRTHDAY! <RETRO_EMOJI_HEART>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiBirthdayConvo2_3115
text_en: Happy Birthday Aoi! Maybe we could clone you a Zeke of your very own…

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiBirthdayConvo2_3116
text_en: ahahahaa no parties please but thank u! guess what I’m listening to right now <RETRO_EMOJI_WINK>

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiBirthdayConvo2_3117
text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_HORRIFIED> why would u joke about that??

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiBirthdayConvo3_3119
text_en: Happy Birthday.

text_en: sorry, I don’t want to sound selfish, but… could u expand on that?

text_en: ur one of my favorite people in the whole world, u know that?

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_3125
text_en: Right back at you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_3126
text_en: There's no one else quite like you.

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/Choice_AoiRank4Convo4_3127
text_en: Yeah, I know that ;)

name: /Lotus/Language/1999Texting/AoiRomance/TxtAoi_AoiRank4Convo4_3128
text_en: seriously ur amazing. everything u’ve faced, everything u’ve become... I’m so grateful to know u

text_en: <RETRO_EMOJI_SMITTEN>
